fields.Business Description:
Polyextract is a French biotech company leading innovation in extraction science to make natural bioactive compounds more accessible and effective.
By applying advanced multi-extraction methods to functional mushrooms, Polyextract creates concentrated, bioavailable liquid supplements that bridge the gap between nutrition and science.
Each formulation is produced in France with strict analytical validation and full traceability.
fields.Long Business Description:
Polyextract is a French biotech company dedicated to unlocking the full potential of functional mushrooms through advanced multi-extraction techniques. The company isolates and concentrates key bioactive compounds such as β-glucans, triterpenes, and erinacines into highly bioavailable liquid formulas.
Produced in France under strict quality control, each extract is standardized and formulation involves HPLC-tested to ensure purity, potency, and transparency.
The company collaborates with research partners and digital health platforms to explore the intersection of cognitive performance, immunity, and natural supplementation, delivering clean, evidence-based solutions for a new generation of health-conscious consumers.
Learn More at : www.polyextract.com

fields.Business Description: Macaron is an innovative personal AI agent designed to help users live better, not just work harder. Macaron creates practical, real-life tools based on simple user requests without requiring complex adjustments. This approach distinguishes it from other AI agents by focusing on enhancing daily life through personalized care and assistance. The platform also features a powerful in-house reinforcement learning system capable of supporting up to 1-trillion parameter language models efficiently and cost-effectively, advancing the capabilities of AI agents significantly.
fields.Long Business Description:
Macaron is an innovative personal AI agent designed to help users live better, not just work harder. DonnaPro is a Europe-based virtual assistant agency built exclusively for CEOs, founders, and growth-stage leaders who refuse to let administrative chaos slow their momentum.

Their executive assistants handle email management, calendar optimization, travel arrangements, investor relations, research, CRM support, marketing coordination, and personal tasks - managing outcomes, not just completing assignments.
All assistants are EU-based, GDPR-compliant, and rigorously vetted through DonnaPro's proprietary HR Time Vault process, which accepts only the top one percent of applicants. Clients typically save up to 60 hours monthly and gain genuine mental clarity - not just productivity gains.
With flexible pricing starting at €2,500 per month, zero commitment for the first 60 days, and a nine-day onboarding process, DonnaPro transforms overwhelmed founders into focused, strategic leaders. fields.Business Description: Groflex is an AI-native enterprise decision operating system designed to unify fragmented business data and automate intelligent actions in real time. Unlike traditional ERP and BI software, Groflex’s platform uses a cutting-edge AI decision layer to continuously learn from diverse sources and instantly optimize workflows across industries. Groflex partners with mid-market enterprises to identify and quantify high-impact use cases, delivering measurable gains in operational efficiency and cost reduction through consultative pilots and outcome-based engagements.
fields.Long Business Description:
Groflex is an AI-driven enterprise technology company focused on transforming how mid-market organizations make and operationalize business decisions. At its core, Groflex delivers an AI-native operating system for enterprise decision management—a real-time, continuously learning platform that unifies fragmented data from across a company’s ecosystem (including ERP, CRM, supply chain, financial, and third-party sources) and turns those signals into immediate, automated actions.
Instead of static dashboards or limited automation, Groflex’s platform operates as a decision layer on top of existing systems—using state-of-the-art artificial intelligence, machine learning, and natural language processing (NLP) to anticipate business needs, prescribe optimal actions, and orchestrate workflows autonomously. Through seamless integration and modern, agentic ERP capabilities, Groflex enables end-to-end process automation (from predictive analytics to anomaly detection, workflow optimization, and resource allocation) across manufacturing, logistics, healthcare, finance, and more.
Groflex’s unique approach is consultative and value-focused: the team partners directly with enterprise clients to identify the highest-value use cases, quantify potential ROI, and operate pilot programs that prove measurable impact—typically achieving 20–30% efficiency gains and 10–20% cost reductions for clients. The company’s enterprise-grade security, compliance (SOC 2, GDPR), robust API integrations, and modular architecture ensure rapid onboarding and easy scalability, while a focus on transparent ROI and outcome-based pricing aligns Groflex’s success with tangible customer results.
With a proven track record—ranking among the top global AI startups, securing pilot contracts in under five hours, and receiving international innovation recognition—Groflex is positioned as the inevitable enterprise AI transformation partner for forward-thinking organizations seeking to rise above the constraints of legacy systems and unlock the next era of business performance.
fields.Tags: AI decision intelligence, workflow automation, enterprise SaaS, consultative pilots

fields.Business Description: Ziro is a design-driven creative technology company based in Kraków, Poland, specializing in human-centered digital health design. fields.Long Business Description:
Ziro is a design-driven creative technology company based in Kraków, Poland, specializing in human-centered digital health design. They focus on creating intuitive and impactful digital health solutions that patients and providers love to use, empowering individuals and enhancing care through a blend of design services and product development targeted at healthcare companies and startups.
Mission
Ziro's mission is to simplify healthcare interactions via intuitive designs and impactful technology, ensuring everyone feels supported and engaged on their health journey. Their philosophy, "The Art of Nearness," emphasizes balancing proximity (close collaboration with clients and users) and distance (challenging assumptions) to drive innovation, viewing perfection as an ongoing iterative process toward "close to perfect" solutions that adapt to user needs and technologies.
Services
Ziro offers user-centric services in the digital health sector, including:
UI/UX Design: User-friendly interfaces for patient and provider experiences.
Branding & Identity: Strategies that resonate with healthcare audiences.
Digital Product Design: Apps and platforms addressing challenges in areas like mental health, fitness/wellness, telehealth, and patient engagement.
Industrial Design: Ergonomic medical devices integrated with digital ecosystems.
Product Prototyping: Functional prototypes ensuring usability and compliance.
Service Design: Seamless journeys across digital and physical touchpoints.
They follow a structured process of discovery, ideation, design, and testing, with a strong emphasis on usability testing and user feedback. Ziro collaborates on new or existing projects, with timelines varying by complexity.

fields.Business Description: Mexty is a no-code, AI-powered authoring platform that enables L&D teams and educators to create interactive, personalized courses in minutes. With SCORM export, templates, and collaboration tools, Mexty makes training faster, scalable, and learner-centric.
fields.Long Business Description:
Mexty is a no-code, AI-powered authoring platform that helps educators, instructional designers, trainers, and parents create interactive, personalized learning content in minutes. Built to simplify and accelerate instructional design, Mexty lets you generate lessons, quizzes, and activities from a prompt, refine them with an intuitive drag-and-drop editor, and export SCORM-compliant packages for any LMS.
Personalization is at the core: adapt content to different learning styles, levels, and paces, and add multimedia, branching, and gamified elements to boost engagement. Ready-made templates and smart automation reduce manual work, so teams can focus on pedagogy, not production. A collaborative workspace supports co-creation, versioning, and reusable libraries, making it easy to standardize quality across courses and programs.
Mexty fits K–12, higher-education, and corporate L&D alike—whether you’re building full courses, microlearning, or quick practice activities. Content can be shared for classroom use, remote learning, or self-study, and integrates seamlessly via SCORM with platforms like Moodle, Canvas, Blackboard, TalentLMS, Docebo, Cornerstone, and more. For richer experiences, Mexty also supports gamification and, via its companion Mext.app, immersive 3D learning scenarios.
Why Mexty
- AI content generation and no learning curve
- Drag-and-drop editing with multimedia and branching
- SCORM 1.2/2004 export for any LMS
- Templates, reuse, and collaboration to save time
- Personalized, learner-centric experiences at scale
Mexty makes modern course creation faster, easier, and more effective—so every learner gets content that truly fits.
fields.Tags: AI authoring platform, corporate training, interactive learning, SCORM compliant

fields.Business Description: Theia Labs transforms routine retinal screening into AI-powered early detection for both eye diseases and systemic health conditions - turning every eye exam into a comprehensive health assessment.
fields.Long Business Description:
Theia Labs is building Europe's first end-to-end AI-powered vision care platform that transforms retinal screening from a fragmented, specialist-dependent process into an accessible, automated healthcare solution. We're addressing a €150B+ vision-loss crisis where over 100 million Europeans risk preventable blindness, yet fewer than half receive timely screening annually.
But our vision extends far beyond eye diseases. The retina is the only place in the human body where blood vessels can be directly visualized non-invasively. Our long-term mission is to make retinal screening the gold standard for general health assessment - a quick, cheap, painless snapshot that can detect systemic diseases like hypertension, hyperlipidemia, and diabetes years before symptoms appear. This positions us to address the leading causes of death through early detection via routine screening.
Currently, our platform combines three breakthrough AI technologies: advanced retinal image analysis models (fundus and OCT), specialized ophthalmology LLMs for patient guidance, and seamless API integrations. Starting with 20+ retinal pathologies through partner optic shops, we're building the infrastructure and clinical validation needed to expand into comprehensive metabolic health screening - transforming every routine eye exam into a powerful preventive health assessment.

fields.Business Description: Remodify is a Cleveland-based startup reshaping how home repairs get done. Our platform connects homeowners with vetted trades professionals through transparent vetting (Remodscore), instant AI-powered estimates (Remodquotes), and smarter job matching (Remodmatch). Built for trust, clarity, and results—Remodify makes repairs simpler for homeowners and growth easier for professionals.
fields.Long Business Description:
At Remodify, we’re rethinking the way home repairs connect homeowners and trades professionals. Built on trust and powered by clarity, our Cleveland-based platform is designed to eliminate the frustrations of the repair industry—missed callbacks for homeowners, empty leads for contractors, and broken trust on both sides.
Our three key solutions transform the process:
Remodscore offers homeowners a transparent, data-driven vetting system.
Remodquotes delivers fast, accurate, AI-powered cost estimates—clear, upfront, and reliable.
Remodmatch connects skilled professionals to the right jobs without junk leads or overpriced fees.
We’re not another gig economy app. Instead, we’re building a sustainable future where tradespeople are valued for their craft and homeowners gain peace of mind. Guided by our Rhythm of Re—reimagine, reinvent, redefine, rediscover, and reshape—we are rebuilding the repair industry from the ground up.
Our mission is simple: make home repairs easier, help professionals grow, and restore trust in the trades.

fields.Business Description: Find-Your-Software revolutionizes digital decision-making by enabling companies to select tailored software solutions independently. Powered by advanced AI and a broad database across ERP, HR & ESG, it replaces consultancy dependence with fast, transparent recommendations. The MVP proves feasibility; its broad application supports sustainable business transformation. By democratizing access to technology and reducing barriers to digitalization, it accelerates innovation and competitiveness across industries.
fields.Long Business Description:
Find-Your-Software – the intelligent platform for software selection
Find-Your-Software is an AI-powered platform that enables companies to make informed software decisions in just a few minutes – tailored, transparent, and without requiring in-depth expertise. The solution analyzes a company’s specific requirements and delivers a customized shortlist of suitable providers. Instead of months of manual research, users receive a qualified selection of relevant software solutions – including data on functionalities, implementation experience, and future viability.
By combining AI technology, market data, and best practices, automated, individualized preselection of enterprise software becomes possible for the first time. Within just six minutes, users receive a reliable decision-making foundation. The platform spans a wide range of software markets and creates genuine market transparency – from comprehensive ERP systems to specialized applications.
Find-Your-Software serves both companies and consultancies: companies benefit from rapid orientation in a complex market, while consultancies use the Selection Portal to support full software selection projects in a methodically structured way – from requirements gathering to contract analysis.
Find-Your-Software fundamentally transforms the software selection process: for the first time, strategic, data-driven preselection is possible – automated, transparent, and clearly structured. The platform was developed by Sectorlens GmbH, a university spin-off based in Potsdam specializing in AI-driven data analysis and digital decision support.

fields.Business Description: Renovo S.r.l. develops advanced robotic recycling solutions for end-of-life photovoltaic panels. By optimizing material recovery of silicon, glass, and metals, we enable closed-loop recycling systems that reduce waste, lower costs, and support the circular economy in the renewable energy sector.
fields.Long Business Description:
Renovo S.r.l. is transforming the end-of-life management of photovoltaic panels through innovative automated robotic processes.
Our project focuses on introducing advanced recycling solutions that optimize material recovery and reintegration into new production cycles. By implementing cutting-edge filtration and processing technologies, we enhance the circularity of our operations, reducing waste and maximizing resource efficiency.
This initiative aligns with our commitment to sustainability by introducing a new approach to our core business. The expected outcome is a scalable, efficient, and environmentally friendly recycling system that supports the circular economy.
Renovo S.r.l. specializes in the recycling of end-of-life photovoltaic panels, addressing one of the main sustainability challenges in the renewable energy sector: the inefficient recovery of valuable materials. Our primary challenge is to develop automated and cost-effective technologies that maximize material recovery while minimizing environmental impact.
We have already conducted feasibility studies and tested preliminary automation processes, showing strong potential to increase recovery rates of silicon, glass, and metals. By further refining and integrating these technologies, we aim to create a closed-loop recycling system that significantly reduces waste, decreases dependence on virgin materials, and improves circularity in the photovoltaic sector.
This project is fully aligned with Renovo’s long-term strategy to lead sustainable solar panel recycling by improving efficiency, reducing processing costs, and contributing to the circular economy.

fields.Business Description: Upwordo is an ad-free language learning platform that helps users build German vocabulary through ultra-short “Micro Stories,” offering focused practice in bite-sized audio and interactive exercises.
fields.Long Business Description:
Upwordo is an innovative language learning service specializing in German vocabulary acquisition through its unique Micro Stories approach. The platform delivers short, quirky, and context-rich stories - each just one to two minutes long - with targeted vocabulary integrated into each narrative.
Learners receive new micro stories regularly via app, email newsletter, or podcast, allowing them to practice and repeat words in consistent, memorable contexts until mastery.
Upwordo stands out by prioritizing deep learning over gamification, using a minimalist, distraction-free interface and avoiding ads altogether. Learners access a growing library of hundreds of micro stories with exercises like fill-in-the-blank challenges, personalized vocabulary drills, and audio listening tasks.
Accessible both on desktop and mobile browsers with no downloads required, Upwordo offers a free story each week and expanded access through its subscription. With an engaged community of thousands, including a top-ranked podcast listeners and newsletter subscribers, Upwordo appeals to learners who want effective, enjoyable, and lasting results.

fields.Business Description: Userbird is a privacy-first, all-in-one web analytics platform for SaaS, ecommerce, and agencies. Combines heatmaps, session recordings, form tracking, and revenue attribution – all cookieless and GDPR compliant.
fields.Long Business Description:
Userbird is a privacy-first, all-in-one web analytics platform that helps SaaS companies, ecommerce brands, and agencies understand how visitors become customers.
Unlike traditional analytics tools, Userbird combines standard web analytics with deep behavioural insights like heatmaps, session recordings, scroll tracking, form analytics, and revenue attribution – all in one simple dashboard. This eliminates the need to patch together multiple tools such as Google Analytics and Hotjar.
Userbird is fully cookieless and GDPR compliant by design. There are no consent banners required, no invasive tracking, and no risk of non-compliance. All data is hosted in Europe to ensure complete data sovereignty.
With real-time reporting and an easy-to-use interface, Userbird enables teams to make smarter marketing and product decisions without compromising on user privacy or adding unnecessary complexity. The platform is designed for modern businesses that want actionable insights and growth-focused data without the hassle.
Learn more at https://userbird.com

fields.Business Description:
SaaS licensed platform for a loyalty program in air cargo  to help freight forwarding agents gain and retain customers by using sustainable aviation fuel credits as incentives. 

Inspired by B2C loyalty programs in air travel, we're bringing this sales tool to the world of air cargo. CargoClub is the B2B loyalty solution for freight forwarders seeking to gain and retain customers.

Vessa is the world's first personified AI restaurant booking assistant that helps people discover and book the perfect restaurant through WhatsApp, phone, or email. We generate revenue through a tiered consumer subscription (Free, Premium, Pro), booking commissions, restaurant partnerships, sponsored experiences, and data analytics. Our tech stack includes a multi-agent architecture with a fine-tuned large language model, a hybrid recommendation system, and encrypted user preference embeddings.

Penelope.travel is a B2B distribution empowering-ecosystem designed to restore autonomy, transparency, and profitability to the travel industry. Built on a real-time, scalable Node.js infrastructure, our SaaS platform connects hotels, service providers, and global buyers through direct, modular, and API-enhanced pathways. Unlike traditional models, we don’t just facilitate transactions—we curate strategic, tailor-made partnerships that align specific offers with well-defined demand, enhancing conversion and long-term value.

We offer light-aviation operators and manufacturers a fully managed flight-data tracking and analysis service under an annual subscription model. Our compact 4G-enabled Flight Data Recorder is rented alongside platform access, so there’s no large up-front hardware purchase. In-flight data (GPS, attitude, engine and sensor parameters) is streamed in real time to our cloud, where our analytics engine applies AI-driven algorithms to detect safety events, optimize maintenance and generate environmental reports.

Sustainable Travel Technologies is a B Corp and certified social enterprise offering data-driven solutions to give its clients the confidence to shout about their sustainability. It's "ecolodgical" software calculates the guest carbon footprint of accommodation clients & verifies the data to ensure compliant with the forthcoming EU Green Claims Directive. The software is aligned with the industry standard HCMI methodology for per stay emissions reporting.
fields.Tags: Environmental Services, Sustainable, Certified B Corp

fields.Business Description: AI travel journal app, helping travellers and backpackers easily document and remember all of their travels. Use AI systems for the chatbot and journal summary. Journey Jotter AI makes capturing your travel stories effortless—so you can focus on exploring and keep the unforgettable, unforgettable.

Xwanderlust is building the first travel social network focused on authentic and sustainable experiences. Our business model combines a free community platform with paid premium memberships for travelers, and marketing and visibility services for destinations and businesses. We integrate AI to personalize content and recommendations, gamification to boost engagement, and storytelling to help users discover hidden gems and connect with local culture.

Echo is a B2C marketplace for responsible travel experiences, built to rebalance the benefits of tourism and ensure it delivers lasting value to the people and places it touches. While similar in functionality to GetYourGuide or Viator, we operate on a different principle, we put purpose before profits. In today’s market, visibility often comes at the expense of impact, forcing regenerative businesses to compete with high-volume, low-value offerings or pay unaffordable commissions, which creates a system where local experiences are hidden and tourism revenue leaks out of the places that need it most.

SkyPass is an AI-powered travel platform that merges real-time search, booking, and concierge services into one seamless user experience. At its core is SK.ai, an intelligent agent that combines structured API data (flights, hotels, weather, etc.) with user preferences to deliver dynamic itineraries and proactive travel assistance. Our revenue model includes commissions from travel partners, premium subscriptions for enhanced features, and B2B white-label solutions.
fields.Tags: AI, Travel Technology, Smart Booking, B2B

fields.Business Description: Sanxo is a platform composed of a mobile application and an intelligent server with integrated AI and ML, which continuously optimizes the user experience. The application allows users to instantly create audio guides based on artificial intelligence models, which can be listened to in their native language. Content generation is done through interaction with various AI models, providing personalized and quality information.

SnapIQ is an AI Agent processing claims for airlines. We streamline the entire process, from intake to payout, combining large language models and rule-based logic to ensure fast, accurate, and regulation-compliant resolutions. Airlines plug SnapIQ into their existing tools, and we charge per claim processed, aligning value with usage.

Our route to market is through coffee roasters and machine distributors, as well as targeting directly events (festivals, sport events...) and busy coffee spot chains. At il Botticelli, we stand for renaissance spirit, playfulness, craftsmanship, and precision. We believe espresso should be a joyful ritual — beautiful, effortless, and expressive.

A social gamified discovery platform with a mobile app in travel and local experiences.

Free for end users, with a commission and subscription model for businesses.

Yaay is an AI and creator-powered travel app that turns your favorite TikTok and Instagram travel videos into bookable trips - instantly. Find a destination, hotel, experience or restaurant you like? Save it to Yaay, organize in visual moodboards, and let our AI find a way to book it. Or discover shoppable videos from trusted travel creators and the community directly on Yaay.

The platform offers detailed performance reports, full social media management, and a dedicated account manager.

Videreo is a social-commerce travel platform that turns creators into travel sellers. Our AI-powered technology transforms their videos into personalized storefronts, interactive travel guides, and a chat-based booking experience, all bookable and fast to launch. Instead of relying on traditional ads, brands pay a commission only when bookings happen, which we split with the creators.

ATS, CRM, spreadsheets, job boards, messaging apps, with one unified system that connects employers directly to a persistent, multi-company talent pool.

Tripso.ai is an AI-powered travel assistant platform that automates customer service for travel businesses, helping them compete with OTAs by providing instant multilingual support and driving direct bookings.
Our technology automatically scans travel business websites and integrates with their API, booking systems to create intelligent AI Agents that respond in under 1 second across 85 languages, handling everything from pricing inquiries to completed reservations.
We operate a SaaS subscription model with three tiers (€49-299/month) targeting the 800,000+ small-to-medium travel operators globally who lose 23% of potential customers due to slow customer service and pay massive commissions to OTAs.

Our trademark-protected concept blends curated community, hospitality, amenities and travel into a scalable lifestyle brand. We operate a dynamic and global mosaic model of owned and leased flagship properties offering alternative homebases on desired locations.

ReLUGG operates a B2B transactional model, partnering with airlines to instantly compensate passengers affected by delayed luggage and provide luggage essentials, all within 30 minutes upon arrival. We charge airlines per passenger served, with no upfront costs or long-term contracts. Our solution integrates seamlessly with airline operations and passenger communications, enabling real-time eligibility checks, service activation, and reporting to minimize airline effort and maximize passenger satisfaction.

myDid is built on secure sovereign identity standards. Our infrastructure is sustainable and low-energy.

fields.Long Business Description:
Refybe is a provider of branded hyper-casual games for marketing campaigns. Refybe.com allows businesses to create and deploy customized hyper-casual games to boost engagement, generate leads, and increase brand loyalty.

fields.Business Description: A place for all things Groningen, brought to you in a short and digestible format. Breaking news, food reviews, event announcements, history lessons, and more.
fields.Long Business Description:
I’m Arian and I moved to Groningen in 2022 due to a series of unexpected events — but I couldn’t be happier for it. One thing I do shame myself for is not knowing as much as I’d like to about this city and everything that happens in it.
So, I started Groningen Mail, a place for all-things-Groningen, brought to you in a short and digestible format. You can expect anything from breaking news to food reviews, event announcements, history lessons, and more.

fields.Business Description: PaperCheck is an AI-powered academic proofreading platform that helps students confidently hand in their work and optimize for the best grade. Featured in Zuger Zeitung and other publications, PaperCheck provides precise feedback on structure, language, and clarity. Its most popular features include argument analysis to strengthen reasoning, a citation checker to ensure accuracy, and logical error detection for consistency. The tool also helps plan remaining tasks efficiently and prepares students for thesis defenses with tailored practice questions and actionable feedback. Affordable and fast, PaperCheck empowers students to submit their work with confidence, ensuring no critical errors are overlooked.
fields.Long Business Description:
PaperCheck is an AI-powered proofreading service designed to help students improve the quality of their academic papers including Theses, Research Papers and Dissertation quickly and affordably. Offering instant and detailed feedback on structure, clarity, and content, PaperCheck empowers students and researchers to refine their work with precision.
Beyond basic proofreading, PaperCheck includes features such as task planning to help manage remaining steps in the writing process, ensuring students stay on track. The platform also offers a unique defense preparation tool, which generates potential defense questions and allows students to practice their responses, receiving constructive feedback to boost confidence.
With specialized models tailored for academic writing, PaperCheck’s AI delivers targeted and in-depth analysis, far exceeding what general tools provide. It highlights areas for improvement without rewriting content, encouraging students to strengthen their own work. Available at a fraction of the cost of traditional proofreading services, PaperCheck makes high-quality academic feedback accessible to all, helping students reach their full potential.
fields.Tags: Academic Writing, AI proofreading, Thesis Defense Prep

fields.Business Description:

We're on a mission to raise the fundraising standards and work towards a future where raising capital for a venture becomes a straightforward task that should consume 10x less time than it currently requires from founders.

Designed for founders, experts, and marketing pros, Pressmaster combines trend intelligence, content creation, and automation in one platform.
AI scans 500k sources to find emerging stories, then creates personalized, high-performance content—social posts, blogs, newsletters—in minutes.
Post everywhere instantly, manage multiple voices and clients, and monitor what’s working—all from your mobile or desktop.

Pressmaster is the all-in-one AI content creation and distribution platform built for thought leaders, agencies, and experts who want to stay ahead of trends and grow their influence at scale.
It starts with spotting the right opportunities. With AI-powered trend detection, Pressmaster scans over 500,000 data sources to surface breakout topics up to 21 days before they go viral. Whether you’re building thought leadership or driving a content marketing strategy, you’ll always be first to the conversation.
From a 5-minute AI interview, Pressmaster creates 30 days of high-performing content including social media posts, blog articles, and newsletters. Everything is fully optimized for each platform and tailored to your brand voice. Content is automatically published across LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, and your blog, saving you hours of manual work.
You can also pin and summarize any article, video, or podcast, then instantly repurpose it into new formats. The mobile app makes it easy to do all of this from anywhere.
Key features include:
•AI-powered trend detection
Spot viral content opportunities up to 21 days early with TrendMaster
•AI interviews and content generation
Turn a 5-minute conversation into 30 days of content across all formats
•Content repurposing tools
Summarize and transform any article, video, or podcast into new content
•Social media automation
Auto-publish to LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, and your blog with platform-specific formatting
•Mobile app
Pin, journal, create, and publish content on the go
•White-label solution for agencies
Manage multiple clients, send branded AI interview links, and generate automated performance reports
•Press release distribution
Publish to over 300 media outlets including Business Insider and Yahoo Finance
•Built-in newsroom
Showcase your media coverage and boost your credibility
•Content performance analytics
Track reach, engagement, and campaign effectiveness
•Multi-brand voice profiles
Train AI on different tones, clients, or departments for consistent messaging
Results:
-3000 percent or more increase in organic reach within 30 days
-93 percent reduction in content creation time
Pressmaster is built for experts, founders, and agencies who move fast, think in moments, and act on insight.
If you’re serious about content marketing, trend-driven growth, and building authority at scale, Pressmaster.ai is your tool.

fields.Business Description: Text to video
fields.Long Business Description:
SmartShort is an all-in-one AI tool that instantly transforms your ideas, text, or audio into high-performing short videos for TikTok, Reels, Shorts, and more.
Key Features
- AI-Powered Video Creation: Generate short videos from text, audio, or a simple idea using AI-driven automation.
- Dynamic Captions & Emojis: Automatically include stylized captions, transitions, and emojis to boost viewer retention.
- Social Media Optimization: Videos are tailored to fit vertical formats and platform-specific best practices.
- Faceless Content: Ideal for creators who prefer not to show their face, no filming required.
Benefits
- Save time on content creation: Automatically generate videos from text or audio in minutes, eliminating the need for manual editing.
- No video editing skills required: The intuitive interface and AI automation make it easy for anyone to create professional-looking videos.
- Create faceless content: Perfect for creators who want to stay anonymous, no need to appear on camera or record yourself.
- Boost engagement on social media: Add captions, emojis, and transitions that align with trending formats to maximize viewer retention.
Use Case
- Make money online: Turn trending topics or affiliate scripts into viral videos that drive clicks and sales—no camera or editing needed.
- Entrepreneurs: Promote your digital products or services with daily short videos generated automatically from your ideas or blog content.
- Marketers: Repurpose existing content into attention-grabbing Shorts that boost engagement and traffic across multiple platforms.

While most sales tools focus on sending cold outreach, Ateni takes over once the emails are sent—reading replies, understanding context, qualifying leads, addressing objections, and scheduling meetings entirely on its own. fields.Business Description: Mealpreper Guide is a smart meal planning app designed for busy individuals and families, helping them save 3-6 hours weekly by providing flexible meal prep menus for delicious, stress-free home cooking.
fields.Long Business Description:
In today's fast-paced world, preparing healthy, diverse meals often leads to stress and wasted time. Mealpreper Guide offers a smarter approach to home cooking, transforming meal preparation from a chore into a seamless, enjoyable experience.
Our app provides flexible meal prep menus, allowing users to cook once and effortlessly assemble varied, delicious plates for 3+ days. Key features include precise shopping lists, guided cooking timers, detailed nutrition information, and the unique ability to scale menus for single individuals or entire families. This smart system consistently frees up 3-6 hours per week for our users, empowering them to focus on living life, not just cooking.
We are driven by a mission to make healthy eating accessible, enjoyable, and truly stress-free, even for those with the most demanding schedules. Our vision extends to integrating online grocery ordering directly within the app, further streamlining the entire meal preparation process from planning to plate.
As a testament to our innovative approach and significant potential in the AgriFood sector, Mealpreper Guide has proudly been accepted into the prestigious AgriFood Innovation Camp 2025 accelerator program. We are committed to continuous development, leveraging user feedback and cutting-edge insights to evolve Mealpreper Guide into the ultimate kitchen companion.

fields.Long Business Description:
Colorazen is a wellness-focused digital platform that offers a wide range of free, high-quality coloring pages specifically designed for adults. Our mission is to help people slow down, reduce stress, and reconnect with their creativity through the simple, calming act of coloring. Unlike children’s coloring sites, Colorazen focuses on intricate and meaningful designs that appeal to grown-up users looking for mindfulness, relaxation, or a creative outlet.
Users can easily browse themed collections — from nature and mandalas to inspirational quotes and abstract art — and download their chosen designs to print at home. Our audience includes wellness seekers, busy professionals in need of a mental break, art therapy practitioners, and creative hobbyists.
Currently free to use, Colorazen’s long-term vision includes offering a premium membership with exclusive designs, curated content, and access to a community where users can share their creations and inspire one another. We believe in the power of simple tools to create powerful moments of calm and joy.

fields.Business Description: AI moodboarding platform
fields.Long Business Description:

Key Features
- Auto-tagging: import images or clip assets from the web and let Kosmik organise and tag them to build your assets library automatically.
- AI search: Select any items and let Kosmik browse the web for you to find related images, links, or even videos.
Benefits
- Build mood boards in seconds: Input a few key words and let Kosmik go online to kickstart your research process.
- Never worry about organising references again: Kosmik categorizes and tags everything you save automatically. It recognizes objects, subjects, and even colors. No need to remember filenames or folders, just describe what you’re looking for, and Kosmik will find it across your canvas.

fields.Business Description: Nexus Inclusion was founded by Kyran O’Mahoney in 2024 to make the world digitally equal to everyone of all abilities. Our suite of tools will enable organisations to quickly, simply and effectively make themselves inclusive and accessible to everyone.
fields.Long Business Description:
Nexus Inclusion was founded by Kyran O’Mahoney in 2024 to make the world digitally equal to everyone of all abilities.
Our mission is to move beyond digital accessibility and ensure that Inclusion is considered at every step of the product development process from idea, design, development, testing, content management, product management and maintaining inclusion post go live.
It’s important for us that the barriers of making something accessible and inclusive are broken down and that it’s simply part of the overall steps that every company takes in releasing digital products to their customers. We focus on finding the best solution and not the problem.
Our suite of tools will enable organisations to quickly, simply and effectively make themselves inclusive and accessible to everyone.
There is currently a growing team based in Ireland and alongside them, Nexus Inclusion has an international team of developers, designers, software architects and product owners all focused with a passion for digital inclusion.
It’s time to double down on inclusion because it’s the right thing to do.
fields.Tags: digital inclusion, web accessibility, digital accessibility, accessibility

fields.Business Description: We streamline web data extraction by transforming unstructured content from any website into clean, structured data — effortlessly and without writing a single line of code. Powered by advanced AI and large language models (LLMs), our platform accelerates the data collection process, enabling users to create unified, consistent datasets across hundreds of diverse websites. Whether you're monitoring markets, aggregating product listings, or powering AI models, we make web data instantly accessible, accurate, and scalable.
fields.Long Business Description:
We make web data extraction simple, fast, and scalable — no coding required. Our AI-powered platform, enhanced by cutting-edge large language models (LLMs), transforms unstructured content from any website into structured, clean data in just a few clicks. Whether you're conducting research, building products, or feeding data into your AI systems, we handle the complexity so you can focus on insights and innovation.
With support for indexing, sitemaps, advanced scraping techniques, and flexible data extraction tools, our platform enables anyone — from analysts to product teams — to collect and unify data from hundreds of different websites effortlessly.
Use Cases:
Build your own aggregator: Launch product, news, or real estate aggregators faster than ever — no need for complex backend scraping logic.
Revolutionize desktop research: Turn traditional manual web research into a smooth, enjoyable experience with AI-assisted extraction.
Flexible scraping options: Choose from smart indexing, sitemap parsing, structured content extraction, and more.
Google Maps Data Access: Instantly access global location data, including business details, contact info, reviews, and metadata — all cleanly structured and ready for use.
At the core of our solution is the Agentic Web Extractor, a fully autonomous agent that navigates, finds, and collects the right data for you. It understands your goals and does the hard work of web browsing, identifying relevant content, and delivering it as structured datasets — ready for analysis, integration, or distribution.
Whether you're a startup, data team, researcher, or enterprise, we empower you to automate your data pipeline and unlock insights at internet scale — all without touching code.
fields.Tags: Data Scraping, AI, LLM, Web Data

fields.Business Description: Carbonetrix is a UK-based startup transforming carbon management in the built environment. Led by Dr Suhaib Arogundade, a Royal Academy of Engineering awardee, the company develops AI-powered tools that simplify project decarbonisation and upskill professionals in sustainability. Backed by DSIT, Tees Valley Combined Authority, YORhub, and the Royal Academy of Engineering, Carbonetrix empowers architects, engineers, and contractors to confidently track, report, and reduce carbon emissions across construction and infrastructure projects. With tailored insights, training, and visual dashboards, the platform enables faster, smarter carbon decisions, turning complex sustainability standards like PAS 2080 into practical actions that make low-carbon construction both accessible and scalable.
fields.Long Business Description:
Carbonetrix is an emerging AI-driven climate-tech startup reshaping how professionals in the built environment approach decarbonisation. Founded by Dr Suhaib Arogundade, an award-winning engineer and sustainability researcher, Carbonetrix was born from the urgent need to make carbon literacy and emissions management practical, actionable, and accessible to the construction industry.
We provide intelligent carbon management tools and real-time visual dashboards (like CaDI and BECM-AI) that help construction and infrastructure professionals reduce Scope 1, 2, and 3 emissions throughout the project lifecycle. Our solutions break down complex carbon reporting standards (e.g., PAS 2080) into simplified insights, empowering teams to spot emission hotspots, reduce embodied carbon, and generate stakeholder-ready reports with ease.
In addition to software, Carbonetrix runs immersive upskilling programmes such as our "Fast Track to Carbon Literacy" email course and Early Access Program (EAP), helping users transition from sustainability confusion to carbon confidence in weeks not months.
Backed by the UK Department for Science, Innovation and Technology (DSIT), the Royal Academy of Engineering, Tees Valley Combined Authority, and YORhub, Carbonetrix is not just a tech provider, but a mission-driven partner enabling a new generation of built environment professionals to take ownership of climate action. By aligning deep industry expertise with cutting-edge AI, we aim to accelerate net-zero delivery across infrastructure and building projects without the administrative burden.
Whether you're a project manager, architect, engineer, or sustainability officer, Carbonetrix is here to help you lead your team into a low-carbon future with tools that actually work on-site, in meetings, and during procurement decisions.

fields.Business Description: AI-powered platform that automates internal linking, on-page SEO & Accessibility compliance, saving you 100+ hours a month.
fields.Long Business Description:
SEOJuice is a self-serve SaaS that drops a lightweight JavaScript snippet (or WordPress plugin) onto any CMS. Once installed it:
• Scans every page daily to surface contextual internal-link opportunities with relevance scoring.
• Automates on-page elements - meta titles/descriptions, image alt text, Open Graph tags and structured schema — improving Core Web Vitals and long-term SEO.
• Adds accessibility & ADA/WCAG fixes for better UX and compliance.
• Generates programmatic pages & content suggestions to close keyword gaps at scale.
• Provides competitor monitoring, technical audits & benchmarks inside a single dashboard, with white-label reporting for agencies.
All optimisations are rendered at request time - your source content stays untouched - so you can switch plans or leave without breaking anything. The changes stay with you forever, even after cancellation.
fields.Tags: SEO Tools, Marketing Automation, AI Content, E-commerce Enablement

fields.Business Description: Instantly translate your UI with inline i18n libraries. Skip the refactors and tech debt. Use the built-in AI localization platform to edit and manage content. Perfect for fast multilingual React and Next.js apps.
fields.Long Business Description:
Inline Translations and AI Are Changing Web Localization
Localization used to be a bottleneck — translation files, context mismatches, and endless refactors. Today’s developers need something better.
Inline UI translation libraries bring localization directly into your components. That means real-time visibility, fewer bugs, and easier maintenance. No more back-and-forth with cryptic key strings.
Pair that with an AI-powered localization platform, and you can edit, manage, and review translations in one place — without developer intervention. It’s a game-changer for product teams and engineers alike.
Less friction, faster launch cycles, and clean code — that’s the power of modern i18n for React and Next.js.

fields.Business Description: Extract, Organize, and Filter page URLs
fields.Long Business Description:
Link Grabber is a Chrome extension that extracts all links from any webpage in one click, eliminating the need for manual copying or coding.
It instantly exports URLs, titles, and attributes to CSV for seamless analysis in spreadsheets, SEO audits, or data pipelines—ideal for researchers, marketers, and developers.
Save time, avoid errors, and streamline workflows with this lightweight, no-code tool for instant link scraping.
Key Features
- Link Finder & Selection: Highlight all hyperlinks in a selected area or extract every URL on the page with one click—perfect for precision or bulk scraping.
- Multi-Page Link Grabber: Scrape links across multiple pages automatically by adjusting the scope—ideal for large-scale research or SEO audits.
- Link Extractor: Export links to Excel, CSV, clipboard, or bookmarks in one step, saving hours of manual copying and formatting.
- Hover Copy Shortcut: Press Ctrl+C while hovering over any link to copy it instantly, speeding up selective URL collection.
- Link Organizer: Extract URLs from text, then filter and review them directly in the extension—no need to switch between tools.
Benefits
- Save Hours of Manual Work: Extract hundreds of links in seconds with one click - no more tedious copying and pasting.
- Structured Data Ready for Analysis: Get clean, organized URLs with titles and attributes exported directly to CSV/Excel for instant use.
- Works Across Multiple Pages: Collect links from entire websites, not just single pages, with the multi-page grabber.
- No Technical Skills Required: Simple point-and-click interface makes web scraping accessible to everyone.
- Perfect for SEO & Marketing: Quickly audit backlinks, analyze competitors, or gather leads without expensive tools.
- Lightweight & Reliable: Runs smoothly in Chrome without slowing down your browser or requiring complex setup.
- Flexible Export Options: Save links to clipboard, spreadsheets, or bookmarks based on your workflow needs.
Use Case
- SEO professionals: Use our link extractor and web link extractor extension to collect backlinks on competitor websites or find broken anchors on your own site.
- Marketing teams: Extract urls from social media platforms or online directories to track brand mentions.
- Researchers: Use the grabber to extract hrefs from academic papers or online resources.
fields.Tags: Productivity, Link Extractor, Chrome Extension, Productivity Tool

fields.Business Description: Wells & Willow ist ein nachhaltiges deutsches E-Commerce-Startup aus Koblenz, das luxuriöse, hypoallergene Bambus-Bettwaren und Accessoires anbietet – weich, atmungsaktiv, hautfreundlich.
fields.Long Business Description:
Wells & Willow ist ein nachhaltiges E-Commerce-Startup aus Deutschland mit Sitz in Koblenz, das moderne Wohntextilien neu denkt – natürlich, hochwertig und verantwortungsvoll. Unsere Marke steht für stilvolles Wohlfühlen mit gutem Gewissen: Wir bieten hochwertige Bambus-Lyocell Bettwäsche, Handtücher und Accessoires, die Haut, Umwelt und Lebensstil in Einklang bringen.
Inspiriert von der Stärke des Weidenbaums und dem Wunsch nach echter Nachhaltigkeit setzen wir auf Bambus-Lyocell – eine innovative Faser, die außergewöhnlich weich, hypoallergen, atmungsaktiv und umweltschonend ist. Unsere Produkte sind OEKO-TEX® zertifiziert, werden plastikfrei verpackt und in wiederverwendbaren Bambus-Stoffbeuteln sowie recycelten Versandkartons im Rahmen der DHL GoGreen-Initiative versendet.
Wells & Willow verfolgt die Vision, nachhaltigen Luxus alltagstauglich zu machen. Mit jedem Kauf unterstützen unsere Kund:innen nicht nur einen bewussteren Lebensstil, sondern auch soziale Projekte wie die Förderung der Frauenbildung in Indien sowie faire Produktion in Asien durch langjährige Partnerschaften mit erfahrenen Herstellern.
Unsere Produkte sind ausschließlich online erhältlich – so ermöglichen wir deutschland- und europaweite Lieferungen mit reduziertem CO₂-Fußabdruck. Ob hautfreundliche Bettwäsche, saugstarke Handtücher oder plastikfreie Geschenkideen: Wells & Willow steht für natürliche Geborgenheit mit Sinn und Stil.

fields.Business Description:
"A matching app for mentors, mentees, and recruiters featuring a unique rating system that fosters long-term collaboration.
 
 Our ideal flow (still in progress):
 Mentors and mentees match with each other through a Tinder-like interface, chat, and set up a meeting. If they are a good fit, they define goals (primarily to reach a new skill level) and agree on the frequency of their meetings. They then begin mentoring, which can be either paid or free. The mentee reports daily progress updates.
 
 Once the mentor and mentee agree that the goals have been achieved, they finalize the mentoring process. The mentor confirms that the mentee has improved their skills to a new level. After that, the mentor can vouch for their mentee to a recruiter looking for someone with the required skills.
 
 If the mentee is hired and successfully passes the probation period, it benefits everyone:
 - The mentor receives a reward,
 - The mentee gains additional skill validation,
 - The recruiter saves valuable time, avoiding hours of interviews with unsuitable candidates."

"Every business relies on data. There’s a lot of information on the internet – but it’s fragmented, spread across multiple websites and platforms, in different formats, inside documents, and in different languages.
 
 Jsonify is an AI agent platform that navigates the web at scale to find, extract, filter and consolidate reliable structured data (ie: a spreadsheet, or a JSON file) out of websites and documents, unlocking value from data that was previously inaccessible. Our no-code AI workflow builder allows easy creation of data tasks that work at scale, sending our agent out to thousands of websites at once with a common objective. We’ve built the world's best data extracting AI agent, using custom computer vision and AI models built with our partnership with Nvidia."

fields.Business Description: CryptoNovaX is a next-generation digital asset management platform that empowers users to securely track, optimize, and grow their cryptocurrency portfolios across multiple blockchains. By combining advanced analytics, automated investment strategies, and robust security, CryptoNovaX makes decentralized finance accessible and efficient for everyone-from beginners to experienced investors.
fields.Long Business Description:
CryptoNovaX is a pioneering digital asset management platform dedicated to transforming how individuals and institutions interact with the world of decentralized finance. Founded in 2024, CryptoNovaX provides a unified, secure, and intuitive environment for managing, optimizing, and growing cryptocurrency portfolios across multiple blockchains, including Ethereum, Solana, and BNB Chain.
At the core of CryptoNovaX is a user-centric philosophy that combines advanced analytics, real-time yield comparison, and automated investment strategies to help users make informed decisions and maximize returns. The platform’s powerful dashboard offers a comprehensive view of all holdings, performance metrics, and market opportunities, empowering both beginners and seasoned investors to take control of their digital assets with confidence.
Security and transparency are fundamental to CryptoNovaX’s approach. The platform is non-custodial, ensuring users always retain control of their private keys, and employs end-to-end encryption alongside regular smart contract audits. Community-driven governance, facilitated by the CNVX utility token, allows users to participate in key decisions, propose new features, and help shape the future of the ecosystem.
CryptoNovaX also places a strong emphasis on education, offering interactive modules and resources designed to demystify DeFi and foster financial literacy. With mobile apps available for both iOS and Android, users can manage their portfolios, monitor yields, and execute strategies anytime, anywhere.
By bridging the gap between cutting-edge technology and user-friendly design, CryptoNovaX is committed to democratizing access to decentralized finance and setting new standards for security, innovation, and transparency in the digital asset space.
fields.Tags: Digital asset management, DeFi, Portfolio optimization, Crypto security

"Context Protocol creates domains for AI-ready data on the blockchain, enabling companies and organizations to store, verify, and share trusted information that can be directly consumed by AI models and agents. By providing unique, authority-verified domains (like .madrid, .wine, .startup), Context ensures that AI systems have access to real-time, verified data sources.
 Think of it like DNS for AI - just as web domains helped organize and verify information for humans browsing the internet, Context's domains help organize and verify data for AI systems making decisions. This creates a trust layer for the AI-powered internet through smart contracts that orchestrate trusted AI interactions.
 The platform helps solve the $406M annual loss from fake data and enables the 41% of companies currently hesitant to adopt AI due to data verification concerns. Through these AI-ready domains, organizations can maintain direct control of their verified data while making it seamlessly accessible for AI consumption.
 And this is just the beginning. As we move toward an AI-driven economy where autonomous agents make high-stakes decisions and conduct transactions, the risks of unverified data multiply exponentially. Without a trusted verification layer, AI agents trading with fake credentials could trigger cascading system failures, leading to market paralysis, financial system instability, and automated value destruction at unprecedented scales. Context's infrastructure is critical for enabling safe AI-to-AI commerce and preventing these systemic risks."

fields.Business Description:
"Trapi is a travel API platform that helps travel sellers automate, and manage, their API integrations, without writing a single line of code!
 
 In depth, our core features we solve are:
 
 1. Streamline commercial agreements between suppliers & sellers.
 2. Define / manage API architecture (modules, schemas).
 3. Automate API integrations.
 4. Shave weeks off of certification process, we automate 80% of that work and provide it directly to the supplier for verification.
 5. Once certified... this is just the beginning, startup travel selling businesses spend 10-20% of their backlog on API development (scaleups: 25-50%, enterprise 55-70%!).
 
 In a bit more depth, Trapi automates API integrations by feeding our AI models context from the API (API docs & specs) and from the customer side (customer selects back and front end files they want to use as part of the integration). With both those elements, Trapi understands the context from both parties and generates customised code to the travel sellers needs and requirements."
fields.Tags: Artificial Intelligence, Travel tech, Airline Connectivity

fields.Business Description:
First Place SEO is a trusted SEO company based in London, helping small and medium-sized businesses improve their visibility on Google through expert local SEO services. As an experienced SEO agency, we specialise in local SEO optimisation, Google Business Profile management, technical SEO audits, and on-page SEO improvements that drive measurable results.

We work with businesses across a wide range of industries including healthcare, legal, construction, hospitality, and ecommerce, delivering tailored strategies that increase organic search rankings, generate local leads, and enhance online presence. Whether you're trying to rank higher for “dentist in London” or aiming to dominate the Google local pack for “electrician near me,” our SEO consultant team is here to help you get found by the right customers.

As a results-focused SEO agency, we offer services such as citation building, content optimisation, website speed improvement, and local keyword research to help you stay competitive. At First Place SEO, our mission is to make your business stand out locally and achieve long-term growth without depending on paid advertising.
fields.Long Business Description:
First Place SEO is a London-based SEO company offering expert-led search engine optimisation services designed to help businesses attract local customers, grow online visibility and convert search traffic into revenue. We are more than just an SEO agency – we are a results-driven partner for ambitious businesses across the UK that want to improve their Google rankings, generate consistent leads and increase online authority.
We specialise in local SEO, technical SEO, Google Business Profile optimisation, and on-page SEO, with a focus on helping small to medium-sized businesses outperform local and national competitors. Whether you are a sole trader, a service-based business, or an established firm aiming to scale, our tailored SEO strategies are designed to deliver measurable results without wasting your budget on short-term tactics.
Our approach is rooted in performance. From our central London office, we deliver expert SEO services backed by hard data, user behaviour insights and proven optimisation practices. Every client works directly with a dedicated SEO consultant who manages the account, runs detailed site audits, researches commercial intent keywords, and builds a plan that aligns with your business goals and budget.
Trusted by UK Businesses
Many of our clients convert up to 30 percent more customers simply by improving their local search presence, targeting transactional keywords and fixing common on-site SEO issues. We also handle review generation, Google Maps optimisation, website performance tuning, and structured data implementation to maximise visibility across search engines.
Our Core Services
Local SEO: Optimise your business for location-based searches, Google Maps, and mobile users. Rank for high-converting queries like "solicitor near me" or "24 hour locksmith London."
Technical SEO: Resolve crawl errors, fix broken links, improve site speed and implement schema markup to help Google understand your site more effectively.
Google Business Profile Optimisation: We manage your profile to ensure accurate data, post updates, generate reviews and increase your chances of appearing in the local map pack.
Content and On-Page SEO: We create and optimise pages that align with search intent using natural keyword placement, internal linking, and topic authority.
SEO Audits and Reporting: Our audits uncover hidden issues, while our monthly reporting keeps you updated on rankings, traffic, leads and ROI.
We offer SEO packages for all types of businesses, from start-up SEO support to aggressive growth plans for multi-location enterprises. Our plans are built to drive performance – whether that’s higher rankings, better conversion rates or more inbound leads.
Why Choose First Place SEO?
As a hands-on SEO consultant team, we do not rely on jargon or generic strategies. We analyse your competitors, audit your site thoroughly, and build a plan using the latest SEO tools and search engine guidelines. Everything we do is aligned with white-hat SEO practices to protect your business from algorithm penalties and keep results sustainable.
We also believe in clear communication. You’ll always know what’s happening with your campaign and why it matters. We’ll never hide behind vague reports or inflate results. Our goal is to help your business grow in ways that can be measured, tracked and repeated.
Additional Services
Our broader digital marketing services include PPC management, high-converting website design, and content writing. As a full-service SEO company, we ensure every part of your digital presence works together to generate traffic, build authority, and deliver results.
First Place SEO supports businesses across the UK, from central London to Manchester, Birmingham, Glasgow, Leeds, Bristol and beyond. If your business needs an SEO agency that prioritises results, integrity, and real business growth, we are ready to help.
Get In Touch
Contact First Place SEO today for a free website audit or to speak directly with an SEO expert. We will show you where your website stands, what your competitors are doing and what you can do to move ahead.
fields.Tags: seo company london, seo agency london, seo consultant london

Fun, Private and encrypted location sharing
fields.Long Business Description:
Paralino is a private and end-to-end encrypted location sharing app. Available for both iOS and Android, it allows for secure location sharing across all mobile devices.
Key Features
- Cross platform, end-to-end encrypted location sharing: Share your real-time location securely across all devices with end-to-end encryption that ensures only authorized contacts can access your whereabouts.
- Place Alerts: Create custom geofences and receive instant notifications when family members arrive at or leave important locations like home, school, or work.
- Full sharing control: Choose exactly what information to share and for how long, with the freedom to pause or stop location sharing at any moment.
- Multiple device support: Connect and monitor all your family's devices under a single account, creating separate groups with different privacy settings for each.
- Device Status Monitoring: View comprehensive device information including battery level, speed, elevation, and network status, with complete control over which details are shared with others.
Benefits
- Feature rich: Access a comprehensive suite of tools including real-time tracking, geofencing, battery monitoring, and group sharing—all within a clean, intuitive interface that requires no compromise on functionality or privacy.
- Peace of mind: Stay connected with loved ones in real-time and receive instant alerts about their safety, providing reassurance without intrusive monitoring.
- Full privacy: Your location data is protected with end-to-end encryption and never leaves your device in plain text, ensuring only those you explicitly authorize can access your whereabouts.
- Based in EU: Enjoy the highest level of data protection under strict GDPR compliance, with everything working exclusively within the European Union.
Use Case
Paralino is a perfect family safety tool, it keeps your loved ones connected without any privacy drawbacks. It is a great travel tracker allowing you to share your location during trips and outdoor activities. You can also use it solo as a personal phone finder and easily locate and track your own devices.

fields.Business Description: SI Robotics is building Europe’s first scalable platform for humanoid robotics, powered by proprietary bionic actuators. Our robots perform physical labour in logistics, manufacturing and defence, replacing human workers in tough, repetitive, or dangerous environments. Designed with dual-use in mind, our systems are built for both industry and national resilience.
fields.Long Business Description:
SI Robotics is creating the first industrial-grade humanoid robots designed and manufactured entirely in Europe. We develop cutting-edge bionic actuators and scalable robotic platforms that combine physical strength, human-like motion, and AI adaptability.
Driven by the urgent need to address Europe’s labour shortage, aging workforce, and defence vulnerabilities, we’re building robots that can lift, move, sort, and manipulate objects just like a human, but better. Our robots are more than machines; they are kinetic teammates designed to work alongside humans in logistics centres, factories, and high-risk environments.
Unlike traditional automation, humanoid robots offer flexibility and adaptability in real-world environments. They don’t require complex infrastructure or reprogramming for every task. They can be deployed in existing workplaces with minimal changes and begin delivering ROI from day one. Each unit replaces 2–3 low-skilled workers while operating 20 hours per day with near-perfect reliability.
At the heart of our technology are proprietary bionic actuators—high-performance, ultra-efficient motion units that mimic the dynamics of human muscles. We design and manufacture these actuators in-house, enabling unmatched energy efficiency, precision, and durability. This gives us total control over performance, cost, and scalability—something most robotics startups lack.
Our business model is built for scale. Just like the automotive and aerospace industries, we’re preparing for mass production from day one. From winding machines and coil magnetisation stations to in-house balancing and assembly, we’ve developed a full-stack production pipeline in Poland, which is Europe’s emerging defence hub.
Our robots are dual-use by design: they’re made to serve both industrial and military needs. Whether unloading trucks in logistics centres, restocking retail shelves, or assisting military logistics units, SI Robotics delivers tangible value. Our systems comply with strict safety and functional standards, making them viable for deployment across NATO-aligned countries.
We combine hardware with intelligence. Our humanoids are cloud-connected and powered by NVIDIA Jetson chips for local AI, with the option to scale up through on-site GPU mainframes controlling entire robot fleets. This hybrid approach enables fluid, natural movement and smart decision-making, without needing massive onboard compute.
Our long-term vision is to become Europe’s “Airbus of Humanoids”—a sovereign robotics infrastructure that reduces dependency on U.S. or Chinese technologies. We’re building not only the robots but the entire stack: hardware, production, deployment, and the SDK platform to invite AGI partners and third-party developers.
We’re backed by a growing ecosystem of industrial partners, academic institutions, and investors who understand that robotics is no longer science fiction. It’s the next great infrastructure revolution.
This isn’t just about building robots. It’s about building a future where physical labour is abundant, efficient, and safe-powered by European technology.

fields.Business Description: FramePack video generation is an innovative video diffusion platform designed to enable high-quality AI-driven video generation directly on consumer-grade GPUs with as little as 6GB of VRAM. Utilizing a revolutionary frame context packing technique, FramePack compresses and manages temporal information efficiently, allowing users to generate consistent, high-quality video sequences without the need for expensive cloud services or high-end hardware. This technology supports next-frame prediction by maintaining a constant-length input, which prevents the common issue of quality degradation over time, known as drifting, through its bi-directional sampling approach. FramePack’s open-source nature encourages customization and community contributions, making it a versatile tool for a wide range of video creation needs. The platform showcases diverse video examples including fashion shorts, product showcases, travel documentaries, food explorations, sports moments, creative ads, daily life, and nature scenery, demonstrating its broad applicability and creative potential.
fields.Long Business Description:
FramePack video generation is an innovative video diffusion platform designed to enable high-quality AI-driven video generation directly on consumer-grade GPUs with as little as 6GB of VRAM. Utilizing a revolutionary frame context packing technique, FramePack compresses and manages temporal information efficiently, allowing users to generate consistent, high-quality video sequences without the need for expensive cloud services or high-end hardware. This technology supports next-frame prediction by maintaining a constant-length input, which prevents the common issue of quality degradation over time, known as drifting, through its bi-directional sampling approach. FramePack’s open-source nature encourages customization and community contributions, making it a versatile tool for a wide range of video creation needs. The platform showcases diverse video examples including fashion shorts, product showcases, travel documentaries, food explorations, sports moments, creative ads, daily life, and nature scenery, demonstrating its broad applicability and creative potential.
- Low VRAM Requirements: Runs on GPUs with as little as 6GB VRAM, suitable for laptops and mid-range systems.
- Frame Context Packing: Efficiently compresses frame information to maintain temporal consistency without increasing memory load.
- Anti-Drifting Technology: Uses bi-directional sampling to prevent quality degradation and maintain scene consistency throughout videos.
- Local Execution: Generates videos entirely on the user’s hardware, ensuring privacy and no dependency on internet or cloud services.
- Optimized Performance: Generates frames at about 1.5 seconds per frame on high-end GPUs, with slower but usable speeds on lower-end hardware.
- Open Source: Fully open-source implementation allowing customization and community-driven improvements.
- Multimodal Input Support: Accepts both text prompts and images to guide video generation creatively.
fields.Tags: FramePack, video diffusion, AI video generation

fields.Business Description: AI-powered server monitoring and task automation for Linux and VPS.
fields.Long Business Description:
Zuzia is an AI-powered platform for server monitoring and task automation. It lets you attach scheduled tasks to hosts and receive alerts when they fail, run too long, or behave unexpectedly. Designed for VPS users, Laravel Forge setups, and DevOps teams who need smart control over infrastructure without complexity.
Key Features
- Host Monitoring: Zuzia connects to your servers and monitors their health by running scheduled tasks and analyzing live responses. If something fails, runs too long, or returns unexpected output — you’re alerted instantly.
- Live Command Execution: Run shell commands directly from your browser and see real-time output from the server, without needing SSH access.
- Website & SSL Monitoring: Keep track of your websites’ uptime and SSL certificate validity. Get notified before downtime or expiration happens.
- Real-Time Notifications: Receive alerts via email or optional SMS the moment something goes wrong — no delays, no noise.
- Laravel Forge & VPS Ready: Easily integrates with Laravel Forge and works seamlessly with your own VPS infrastructure, making it ideal for both development and production environments.
Benefits
- Peace of Mind: You no longer have to worry about silent task failures or missed alerts — Zuzia watches over your infrastructure 24/7.
- More Time for Real Work: By automating repetitive server tasks and centralizing monitoring, Zuzia frees you up to focus on building, not babysitting.
- Early Problem Detection: Thanks to real-time AI analysis of task outputs and server responses, you catch issues before they escalate.
- No Complex Setup: Lightweight agent, simple interface, and no confusing dashboards — you can get started in minutes, not hours.
- Works with Your Stack: Whether you're on Laravel Forge, a custom VPS, or a hybrid setup, Zuzia fits in without needing to change your infrastructure.
- No Vendor Lock-In: You control your servers — Zuzia simply helps you monitor and automate them without taking over.
Use Case
Monitoring Veeam Backup Status (Free Edition):
You’re using the free version of Veeam Agent for Linux, which doesn't include email notifications or central monitoring. With Zuzia, you can create a recurring task that checks the backup status and sends an alert if something goes wrong — no more guessing if your data is safe.
Disk Space & System Load Monitoring:
Create tasks that periodically check available disk space or track what's using the most resources. Zuzia notifies you when thresholds are crossed, helping you prevent downtime due to full disks or overloaded servers.
Executing Commands Without SSH Access:
You're on the go, without access to SSH, and need to restart a service, check logs, or trigger a script. With Zuzia, you can run live shell commands directly from your phone, securely, from the dashboard.
fields.Tags: Developer Tool, AI Task Monitoring, Server Cron Tracking, Linux Automation

Rhytmo is a groundbreaking technology that takes music beyond sound. We have created a SaaS platform that transforms music into physical sensations through haptic wearables, leveraging cutting-edge artificial intelligence and advanced haptic technology. Rhytmo has highly disruptive applications in entertainment. It revolutionizes concerts, streaming platforms, and virtual reality experiences, offering users an entirely new dimension to enjoy their favorite music.
Rhytmo’s value proposition is not only disruptive but also has wide-ranging implications:
· Integration with streaming platforms: Imagine listening to music on Spotify, Apple Music, or YouTube while each song is translated into physical sensations. We'll leverage these platforms' APIs to connect with millions of users seeking new experiences. · Immersive concerts: Whether live or at home, concerts will transform into entirely new experiences. Attendees will feel the intensity and emotions of each song through haptic wearables, fostering a deeper connection between the music and the audience. · Artist-customized sensations: Musicians will have the opportunity to design the physical sensations accompanying their songs, expanding their art beyond sound and creating a unique experience for their fans. · Collaborations with the Music and Entertainment industries: Our technology can integrate not only into music but also into virtual reality platforms and live events, opening new doors for creativity and business. · Inclusion for people with hearing disabilities: Rhytmo offers new possibilities for individuals with hearing impairments, enabling them to experience music through physical sensations and fostering a unique emotional and inclusive connection with the auditory world. · The decline in haptic wearable costs: As these wearables become more affordable and widely adopted, an incredible market opens up, ready to embrace these new experiences.
Our vision is clear: to become leaders at the intersection of music, technology, and experiences. We firmly believe this product can go viral, with the potential to significantly impact not only how people enjoy music but also how the entertainment and tech industries generate value.
