fields.Business Description: Ecommerce innovation lab creating software products for lifestyle brands on Shopify.
fields.Long Business Description:
Technology was meant to set brands free. To give control back to the creators, the innovators, the businesses built on originality. Instead, it’s done the opposite.
The very systems designed to support growth have become the chains that hold brands back. Marketplaces, platforms, and third-party solutions demand more—more data, more margins, more power—while giving less. The result? Founders become dependent. Margins shrink. The brands that built the industry become collateral damage, while the investors and platforms take the upside.
At Almond Labs, we believe in a different way. We are independent. Built by Studio Almond and focused on lifestyle brands who refuse to be boxed in.
We built Roadmap, our no-code Shopify toolkit, because we saw how brands were being held back. Instead of one-off fixes and expensive custom development, we develop solutions that work across businesses—so brands can access high-performance features without the overhead.
We consult because we know that technology alone isn’t enough. Success comes from strategy, from insights, from a partner who sees beyond the build to what really drives growth.
Now, we’re launching Cassi—a Buy Back & Consignment platform designed to help brands own their resale market. Instead of watching third-party marketplaces take control, brands can reclaim their secondhand economy, keep customers engaged, and build resale into their own ecosystem—on their terms.

World's first web augmentation platform. Secure, collaborative, and automated web Experiences via virtualization layer.
fields.Long Business Description:
Webfuse provides a new, web augmentation platform enabling businesses to manage and secure their interactions with any web applications and websites.
Utilizing an advanced virtualization layer, Webfuse creates isolated, controlled, and customizable environments known as Virtual Web Sessions.
Core Capabilities of VWS(Virtual Web Session):
- Session Sharing: Allow multiple users to securely join and interact within the same virtual web session.
- Automation API: Programmatically manage and interact with virtual sessions to automate repetitive tasks or integrate with other systems.
- Virtual Participant Functionality: Utilize automated scripts or "virtual users" to perform actions within sessions.
- Extensibility: Leverage session events/actions and virtual web extensions to add custom logic and features to the virtual sessions.
- Session Recording: Capture sessions for training, troubleshooting, or compliance verification purposes.
- Content Masking: Automatically obscure sensitive data fields within sessions to protect information during observation or recording.
- Audit Logs: Maintain detailed logs of activities within virtual sessions for review and analysis.
- Advanced Security Features: Includes configurable options such as Cookie Guard, participant authentication/verification, additional request/response header injection, and a Lockdown App add-on for enhanced restrictions.
fields.Tags: Web Augmentation,Virtual Web Session,Web Virtualization,Web Session Management,Secure Web Gateway,

fields.Business Description: Deepwriter AI is an AI long format content writer. It can write anything from research papers, guides, and even novels
fields.Long Business Description:
Deepwriter represents a revolutionary advancement in AI-assisted writing technology, fundamentally transforming how artificial intelligence supports long-form content creation across all writing disciplines. At its core, Deepwriter utilizes a groundbreaking multi-agent AI system that transcends the limitations of traditional AI writing tools, which are typically constrained by fixed context windows that limit their ability to maintain coherence across lengthy documents.
Our proprietary agentic AI architecture employs multiple specialized AI agents working in concert, each handling different aspects of the writing process while maintaining perfect synchronization and context awareness. Unlike conventional AI writing assistants that struggle to maintain consistency beyond a few pages, Deepwriter's agents collaboratively manage entire documents, ensuring logical flow, argumentative coherence, and consistent style across works of any length – from research papers and technical documentation to academic dissertations and creative works.
This innovative approach allows Deepwriter to break free from the context window constraints that plague other AI writing systems. While traditional AI writers lose track of earlier content as they progress, our agent network maintains a comprehensive understanding of the entire work, enabling truly coherent long-form content generation. Each agent contributes its specialized expertise – whether in structural organization, citation management, technical accuracy, or stylistic refinement – while working in harmony with the others to produce polished, professional content.

fields.Business Description: SCDA Facility Allocator is an analytics tool that allows supply chain planners and service network designers to allocate sales stores, warehouses, and service facilities at profit maximizing locations.
fields.Long Business Description:
The SCDA Facility Allocator is an prescriptive analytics tool that fosters artificial intelligence and allows supply chain managers, service facilitiy planners, distribution chains, supermarkets, franchise business, and others to plan and optimize profit maximizing allocation of thei stores, warehouses, and service facilities. 
Using a computerized optimization model and mathematical problem solvers the SCDA Facility Allocator:
1) captures spatial distribution of market demand
2) considers all potential facility allocations
3) considers CAPEX for each candidate facility
4) considers operative expenses for each candidate facility
Based on this, the SCDA Facility Allocator visualizes spatial distribution of customer demand, decides on the optimal amount of facilities, and selects the most promising service facility locations.
The tool has been applied to e.g. Barber Shop Franchises. In a more recent use case application the SCDA Facility Allocator helped a Barber Shop Franchise operation to decide on service facility investments in several major cities in Brazil, including Rio de Janeiro.

fields.Business Description: Haier HR automates hiring with AI-powered resume screening, virtual interviews, and skill-based assessments. Streamline recruitment, reduce bias, and make smarter hiring decisions with ease.
fields.Long Business Description:
Haier specializes in developing an innovative AI-driven hiring platform. Its flagship product is an
automated web application that analyzes candidate resumes and generates detailed reports on
their strengths, weaknesses, and skills in the form of radar charts.
High-scoring candidates are invited for an interview conducted by an AI-powered virtual
interviewer. Following the interview, another detailed report is generated to assess candidate
responses and provide further insights into their skills and suitability for the position.
This system aims to automate and streamline the hiring process, allowing companies to save
time and improve the quality of candidate selection.
Problem:
Haier addresses the major challenges of traditional recruitment:
● High Volume of Applications: Recruiters spend significant time sorting through
hundreds of CVs for each job posting, with an average ratio of 250 applications per hire.
● Time-Consuming Screening: Conducting numerous pre-screening interviews,
averaging 10 interviews per hire, is repetitive, inefficient, and prone to human error and
unconscious bias.
By automating these processes, our platform reduces the number of applications to review and
interviews to conduct, improving recruitment efficiency, quality, and cost-effectiveness.
Solution:
Haier utilizes AI to automate critical recruitment processes:
● Automated CV Analysis: Our algorithm rapidly analyzes resumes, identifying key skills
and qualifications, eliminating unconscious bias and human error.
● Detailed Reports and Skill Visualizations: Each candidate is assessed on their
strengths and weaknesses, providing recruiters with clear and actionable insights.
● Automated Virtual Interviews: AI-powered virtual interviewers conduct standardized
assessments, reducing the need for in-person interviews and improving efficiency.
Haier allows recruiters to focus on the qualitative assessment of top candidates, reducing
recruitment costs and improving the overall quality of hires.

At Minutes 90 UG, we envision a football industry where talent discovery, transfers, and career growth are streamlined by technology and data-driven insights. We believe in breaking traditional barriers by providing intelligent digital solutions that optimize player performance, marketability, and business operations within the sports industry.
Core Services & Solutions
1. Digital Player Transfer Platform
	•	A state-of-the-art online marketplace connecting clubs, agents, and players to facilitate transparent and efficient player transfers.

2. AI & Data-Driven Sports Performance Analytics
	•	Advanced machine learning algorithms for player performance tracking and injury prediction.

	•	High-performance training camps for player development and skill enhancement.

	•	Tech-driven sports exhibitions and networking events to connect stakeholders from the football industry.
6. Global Networking & International Transfer Support
	•	A trusted ecosystem for clubs, players, and agents worldwide to connect and collaborate.
	•	Cross-border transfer support, considering legal, cultural, and regulatory factors.
	•	Strategic alliances with football academies, scouting agencies, and professional leagues.
Why Choose Minutes 90 UG?

	•	Innovative Approach: We leverage the latest in sports technology, marketing, and analytics to drive value for our clients.

Join the Future of Football with Minutes 90 UG!

fields.Business Description: Perfecting Stent-graft Implantation, one stent at a time
fields.Long Business Description: We are a cardiovascular AI-driven startup simulating the thoracic endovascular aortic repair treatment (TEVAR) in the pre-operative phase. With our approach, we increase dramatically the current granularity of insights based on which the surgeons choose the stent device for each patient. We are 3D reconstructing the CT scans of the patient, obtaining its "TEVAR-twin", then we simulate dinamically and interactively the interaction between the patient-specific geometry and the different stent candidates. We continue by post-processing it using curated AI models to gather all points of view surgeons are interested in seeing to make a data-driven decision. Our tool is a clinical decision making support system based on a patented and validated workflow, with more than 90% accuracy.

fields.Business Description: tappcard offers innovative digital business cards utilizing NFC technology, enabling instant sharing of contact information without the need for additional apps. Designed for unlimited use, tappcard allows you to update your information anytime without extra costs, making it a cost-effective and eco-friendly alternative to traditional paper cards.
fields.Long Business Description:
In the modern business landscape, making a lasting impression is crucial. tappcard revolutionizes networking with its digital business cards that leverage NFC (Near Field Communication) technology for seamless contact sharing. By simply bringing your tappcard close to another person's smartphone, your business card details are instantly displayed and can be saved in less than 10 seconds, all without the need for additional applications. 
One of the standout features of tappcard is its unlimited usage. A single tappcard replaces the need for continually printing paper business cards, offering a sustainable and cost-effective solution. The initial investment in a tappcard equates to approximately 150-200 regular business cards, but it can be shared tens of thousands of times, reducing the cost per share significantly over time. 
Flexibility is at the core of tappcard's design. Users can update their contact information as frequently as needed without incurring additional charges, ensuring that recipients always have access to the most current details. The elegant design of tappcard ensures you leave a memorable impression on potential partners and clients. 
Compatibility is another key advantage. tappcard works with over 95% of leading smartphone brands. For devices that do not support NFC technology, each digital card includes a unique QR code as an alternative sharing method. This ensures you can connect with others regardless of their device's capabilities. 
Embracing tappcard means choosing an eco-friendly alternative to traditional business cards, reducing paper waste and contributing to environmental sustainability. It's a modern, stylish, and practical solution for professionals seeking to enhance their networking experience.
fields.Tags: tappcard, digital business card, electronic business card

fields.Business Description: The Time Complexity Calculator of Big O Calculator makes it easy! Whether you're a student learning about algorithm efficiency or a professional optimizing code, our tool provides instant insights into time complexity and space complexity analysis with AI.
fields.Long Business Description:
The Big O Calculator, accessible at bigocalculator.online, is a tool designed to analyze the time and space complexity of algorithms written in programming languages such as C, C++, Java, and Python. Users can input code snippets—up to 2000 characters—and receive a breakdown of complexity expressed in Big O notation, which describes how an algorithm’s performance scales with input size. The tool processes code by examining elements like loops, recursion, and control flow structures to estimate runtime and memory usage.
In addition to basic complexity calculations, the tool generates visual representations that illustrate how performance changes with varying input sizes. A library of common algorithms is included, allowing users to compare their code against standard examples. Explanations accompany the results, detailing the factors contributing to the calculated complexity, while suggestions for optimization are provided based on the analysis. The interface supports multiple languages, making it accessible to developers working in different coding environments.
Security is handled by processing all inputs locally within the user’s browser, ensuring that code is not stored or transmitted externally. The tool caters to a range of users, from students learning algorithm fundamentals to professionals reviewing code efficiency. While it performs well with standard coding patterns, complex algorithms with intricate nested structures may require additional manual review for accuracy. Support for more languages beyond the current four is reportedly in development, though no timeline is specified. Educational use is also noted, with pricing options mentioned for institutions, though details are not provided on the site itself.

fields.Business Description: AI creative studio: turning "impossible" to "done" in seconds.
Eco Pool Filters
fields.Long Business Description:
EFPF LTD
                                      Eco Pool Filters
The Eco Pool Filter – an-easy-to-use filter, that vastly reduces energy, water, chemical usage and related costs.
Cyprus registered company HE 455836
Incorporated 26th January 2024
Directors and shareholders – Nick and Jill Gardner
Accountant and Secretary – Nick Gardner - Nick has over 30 years experience in filters, pumps, pools and other water related products. He has run his own businesses for 18 years. Nick is also an accountant and headed a Trust company accounts department for 6 years.  
Save billions of litres of water and electricity annually worldwide.
Water is crucial to life. Energy consumption is a worldwide issue. 
The Problem.
More than 45 billion litres of water are wasted annually across southern Europe’s residential pools alone through backwashing of swimming pool sand and glass media filters (note 1) which remove particle matter greater than 40 micron and require 6 to 8 hours of circulation per day during the summer. (Note 2) 
The Solution. The Eco Pool Filter by EFPF LTD designed and developed by Nick Gardner
How do we save this needless, vast waste of water and energy? A cleverly designed, yet simple filter that also reduces chlorine and other environmentally damaging chemical usage – the EFPF Filter. The Eco Pool Filter significantly reduces energy and water consumption, especially relevant in hot, arid climates where water is scarce. We are looking for an investor to be part of this solution.
Key Advantages:
Reduce electricity usage by more than 25% (Note 2)
Saves more than 90% water (Note 3)
No need to ever vacuum to waste
        – a further saving of water and electricity (Note 4)
Saves time
Easy to use and clean
Unique cartridge filter, patent pending (Note 5)
Lowers chlorine and other harmful chemical usage (Note 6)
Extended pump life (Note 7)
Cost effective (Note 8)
Competitive pricing (Note 10)
 Each filter uses less than 150 litres per annum for cleaning, potentially saving 44 billion litres of water in southern Europe and a bonus saving of 3.8 million KWH of electricity. 
Marketing:
We have engaged Click Marketing (www.clickmarketing.co.uk) to undertake professional branding and build a website with online sales and shipping to reach the global market. To drive additional sales Amazon and retail pool product outlets will be used.
Capturing just 1% of just the southern European market will realise a turnover of Euro 6 million with a potential pretax profit of Euro 4.5 million. We already have a contact looking into the Australian market worth 1.5 million based on 1% of domestic pools. Add to this the ongoing after sale market of the filter cartridges that are unique to EFPF, this is a solid investment opportunity.  
Additional funding:  
To date we have invested Euro 47,530 in this cost saving, ecofriendly project. We own all the moulds, a prototype has been tested over 18 months with excellent results and we are ready to go to production.
To launch the first 1,000 units onto the market an additional Euro 27,000 is required. This will cover all costs involved as per the budget on page 4 below.
We are seeking an investment of Euro 27,000 at 11% in return for 10% shareholding in this lucrative business.
Notes:
1.	An average domestic pool (40,000 litres) sand filter is backwashed 12 or more times per annum. Some pool cleaning companies recommend every week through the summer. Each backwash lasts around 3 minutes resulting in waste of 600 litres of water or a minimum of 7,200 litres per annum. There are more than 6.5 million residential pools in southern Europe equating to more than 45 billion litres of water wasted per annum.
2.	A prototype of EFPF filter was tested over a period of 18 months on a pool that is subject to high volumes of dust and debris. During the summer months the pool was filtered for a maximum of 3 hours per day and no problems developed. This proves that with EFPF filter filtration time can safely be lowered to 4 hours per day, compared with a minimum of 6 hours per day when using a sand filter, a saving of over 25%. 40,000 litre pools need a minimum 1 KW pump, saving 2 KWH per day equates to saving over Euro 220 per annum based on Cyprus current electricity rates. This saves more than the cost of an EFPF filter in the 1st year.
3.	Trials of the EFPF filter on a pool that is subject to well above normal levels of debris, dust and other foreign matter have proved that the filter requires less than 10 litres of water per clean, 12 times per annum, a saving of at least 7,080 litres per annum, well above 90%.
4.	Sand or glass filters do not filter out fine dust, algae or other particles and, if not vacuumed to waste, return to the pool. EFPF alleviates this problem completely. A further water and energy saving.
5.	The EFPF filter uses a unique cartridge filter that incorporates a debris basket, the only cartridge of this type worldwide. The key advantage is its ease of cleaning. We already own the mould for this filter cartridge and it is patent pending. The filter cartridge is antibacterial reducing risk of ear and other infections.
6.	Every time you backwash it is not only the water that is wasted, the chlorine and other chemicals previously added to that water go down the drain too. In addition, normal backwashing of sand or glass filters does not get rid of all the bacteria and foreign matter which results in higher usage of chlorine and other environmentally damaging chemicals.
7.	The EFPF filter is installed in the vacuum line preventing any foreign matter from getting to the pump which can damage the impellor and other pump parts resulting in premature failure of the pump.
8.	Other cartridge filters designed for use with 40,000 litres pools are more than double the retail cost of the EFPF filter and they are all installed after the pump so any foreign matter that is not trapped in the pump basket goes through the pump causing wear to the impellor and other parts. In addition, the pump basket needs to be emptied frequently as well as cleaning the filter.
9.	Free up space. Pool rooms are often small, the sand filter and related parts taking up most of the space. The Eco Pool Filter takes up far less space and the bulky sand filter is no longer needed.
10.	The Eco Pool Filter will retail at Euro 120 for a complete unit. Other brands of cartridge filters such as Hayward and Astral retail for over Euro 250 and do not offer the unique Eco Pool Filter advantages.

fields.Business Description: Text Repeater is a versatile tool for duplicating text effortlessly across platforms like WhatsApp, SMS, and Telegram. Ideal for content creation, design, development, and data entry, it offers customizable formats and easy copying for seamless use.
fields.Long Business Description:
Introducing Text Repeater, a versatile tool that allows you to enter your text and customize how it repeats effortlessly. Whether you're using WhatsApp, Messenger, SMS, Telegram, or any other platform, Text Repeater is the perfect solution for various use cases:
Content Creation
Perfect for creating placeholder text, generating test data, or repeating design elements in documents and presentations.
Design & Layout
Useful for designers who need to repeat patterns, create text-based designs, or generate sample content for mockups.
Development & Testing
Ideal for developers who need to generate test data, create sample content, or populate databases with repeated values.
Data Entry & Analysis
Streamlines the process of creating structured data sets, repetitive formulas, or consistent data patterns for analysis.
How to use Text Repeater
1. Enter Text
• Type or paste your text in the input box
• Set the number of times you want to repeat it
• The text can be anything - words, phrases, or symbols
2. Customize Output
• Choose to add periods, spaces, or new lines
• Select your preferred output format:
Normal: Basic repetition
Vertical: Each on new line
Horizontal: Space-separated
3. Generate & Copy
• Click "Repeat Text" to generate
• Review your output in the result panel
• Use the copy button to save to clipboard
• Modify and regenerate as needed
fields.Tags: Text Generator, Content Creation, Placeholder Text, Repeated Text, Automation, Development, Testing, Data Entry, Formatting, Text Repeater

By using advanced natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning, Medgical generates accurate, real-time documentation, reducing the time doctors spend on administrative tasks by up to 2 hours daily. This allows healthcare providers to focus more on patient care, improving overall productivity and satisfaction.
In addition to the AI Medical Scribe, Medgical offers patient-centric tools that bridge the communication gap between doctors and patients. The platform generates easy-to-understand summaries of consultations, therapeutic plans, and updated medication tables, which can be securely shared with patients. This ensures patients retain critical medical information, improving adherence to treatment plans and overall health outcomes.
Medgical also addresses challenges in the clinical trials industry by streamlining patient recruitment and automating bureaucratic processes. The platform analyzes patient data during consultations to assess eligibility for clinical trials, significantly reducing recruitment time and costs. fields.Business Description: MokN revolutionizes credential security with deception technology that traps attackers before they can exploit stolen logins. Our proactive approach helps businesses detect breaches early, automate incident response, and strengthen their cybersecurity posture.
fields.Long Business Description:
MokN is redefining cybersecurity with a proactive, deception-driven approach to credential theft prevention. Traditional security solutions focus on detecting breaches after they occur - MokN stops them before they happen. By deploying realistic, high-fidelity decoys (such as fake VPN and webmail portals), our technology intercepts stolen credentials at their source, providing early warning of targeted attacks.
Unlike dark web monitoring, which only identifies compromised credentials once they have been publicly leaked, MokN retrieves them in real time directly from the attackers. This allows security teams to block unauthorized access, automate remediation workflows, and prevent breaches before they impact the organization.
Designed for seamless integration with existing security frameworks, MokN’s solution enhances SOC (Security Operations Center) efficiency by delivering actionable intelligence, reducing alert fatigue, and improving response time. With a focus on innovation, automation, and real-time threat detection, MokN empowers businesses to take control of their security and neutralize threats before they escalate.
fields.Tags: Deception Technology, Stolen Credentials Protection, Cyber Threat Detection, Anti-Phishing, Cybersecurity, SaaS

fields.Business Description: SparkSpot is a smart parking platform that connects owners of unused parking spaces with drivers searching for convenient and affordable parking. The technology operates through a fine-tuned AI model specialized in visual software interaction. With just a URL and login credentials, Orango learns a product’s interface and becomes ready to assist users without requiring extensive development efforts from the business. Companies can integrate Orango with a single line of code, making it a scalable and cost-effective solution for enhancing the user experience.
With a rapidly growing market for AI-powered agents, Orango AI is positioned to revolutionize how businesses approach user onboarding, customer support, and automation, ultimately driving better engagement and higher retention rates.

fields.Business Description: Cerca Commercialista is a digital platform that helps businesses and professionals in Italy find and compare accountants based on location, industry, and services offered. Cerca Commercialista is an innovative digital platform designed to help businesses and professionals in Italy easily find and compare accountants based on location, industry, and specific services. Whether you're a startup, freelancer, or established company, our goal is to simplify the search process and connect you with the right financial expert to manage your accounting, taxation, and business compliance needs.
Finding a reliable accountant in Italy can be a time-consuming and frustrating process. Many businesses struggle to identify the right professional who understands their industry and specific financial requirements. Traditional search methods rely on word-of-mouth or generic directories that don’t offer tailored recommendations.
Cerca Commercialista was created to eliminate this challenge by providing a smart, searchable database of verified accountants across Italy. With our platform, users can filter professionals based on:
Location (city, region)
Industry expertise (real estate, retail, tech, healthcare, etc.)
Services offered (tax returns, VAT management, payroll, business advisory, etc.)
Legal entity type (freelancers, startups, SMEs, corporations)
How It Works
Search: Enter your business type and required accounting services.
Compare: View a list of accountants tailored to your needs, complete with service details and client reviews.
Connect: Contact the best match and start optimizing your financial operations.
Unlike generic business directories, Cerca Commercialista is built specifically for professionals and entrepreneurs looking for trusted financial experts. We focus on:
Precision: Advanced filters to match accountants with businesses based on expertise.
Efficiency: No more endless searching—find a qualified accountant in minutes.
Transparency: Access clear information about services, pricing, and client feedback.
Who Can Benefit from Cerca Commercialista?
Entrepreneurs and startups looking for financial guidance.
Freelancers needing help with tax compliance.
SMEs and corporations seeking industry-specific accounting expertise.
Accountants who want to grow their client base and increase their online visibility.
Our Mission
At Cerca Commercialista, we aim to simplify and modernize the way businesses connect with financial professionals. By leveraging technology, we help entrepreneurs save time, reduce stress, and make informed financial decisions that drive growth.
Join us in transforming how accounting services are found and accessed in Italy.

fields.Business Description:
Crane productivity and maintenance
Incorporates analysis and continuous monitoring of your cranes' condition:

Monitor the evolution of the work classification of your cranes.
Monitor the lifespan of your crane in real-time.
Daily and automated reports with the status of your cranes.
fields.Long Business Description:
You will be able to consult how the work classification evolves for your cranes based on their usage (M1 ➡ M8).
The supported load, working time, performed maneuvers, and other factors are monitored at each time interval.
Subsequently, calculations are carried out, and the results are presented through interactive graphs and dashboards.
You will have access to a comprehensive view of the current state of your crane at all times.
The lifespan of your crane will be represented as a percentage based on stress calculations, taking into account its technical specifications, working hours, and supported load.
IkolCrane will be responsible for notifying all the changes your cranes undergo with notifications, SMS, and reports.
These reports show the crane's movements, the load supported, and the evolution of other metrics that may influence its performance.
These reports are sent daily, quarterly, and annually.

For Website Owners: Protect your user areas from account takeovers, malicious bots, and common web vulnerabilities caused by user behavior.
For Online Communities: Combat spam, prevent fake registrations, and stop re-registration from the same IP addresses.

fields.Business Description: Real-time AI interview assistance, Context-aware responses, Undetectable support, Personalized answers based on resume and job role, Seamless integration with video conferencing platforms, Supports 30+ languages, Industry-specific question handling, AI-powered confidence boost, Instant response suggestions, Silent background operation, Adaptive learning for improved answers, Mock interview practice, Resume-based response optimization, 24/7 availability, No credit card required for free plan.
fields.Long Business Description:
JobBridge is an AI-powered interview assistant designed to help job seekers excel in job interviews with real-time, intelligent support. The platform provides instant, context-aware responses based on a candidate’s resume, job role, and industry, ensuring they can confidently tackle even the toughest interview questions. Whether preparing for behavioral, technical, or industry-specific interviews, JobBridge acts as a silent, undetectable companion that enhances communication and clarity. By integrating seamlessly with major video conferencing platforms, it provides support without disrupting the natural flow of conversations.
At the core of JobBridge is advanced AI-driven technology that processes live conversations and delivers relevant, structured answers in real-time. Unlike traditional interview preparation tools, which rely on static question banks or pre-recorded sessions, JobBridge dynamically adapts to each interview scenario. It personalizes its suggestions to match a candidate’s experiences, skills, and job expectations, allowing for more authentic and effective responses. Supporting over 30 languages, the platform caters to a global audience, making it a valuable tool for job seekers in various industries and regions.
JobBridge also enhances interview preparation by offering mock interview simulations and adaptive learning capabilities. Candidates can practice with AI-generated questions, receive real-time feedback, and refine their responses before facing a real interviewer. This feature not only boosts confidence but also helps users improve their articulation and delivery over time. Additionally, the AI continuously learns from user interactions, improving its response accuracy and relevance to different job roles.
With a commitment to helping professionals secure their dream jobs, JobBridge provides both free and premium plans to cater to different levels of support. Its simple and intuitive design makes it accessible for users of all experience levels, from entry-level candidates to senior professionals. As the job market becomes increasingly competitive, JobBridge is set to revolutionize the way people approach interviews, empowering them with the confidence and tools needed to succeed.

fields.Business Description:
At Velatir, we believe that the future of artificial intelligence is built on a foundation of trust, transparency, and accountability. Our mission is to empower businesses with the tools they need to integrate human judgment into their AI systems, ensuring that technology complements—not replaces—human oversight.

Who We Are
Velatir was founded with a clear vision: to bridge the gap between cutting-edge AI innovation and responsible governance. We recognize that while AI has the potential to transform industries, its decisions can sometimes carry significant consequences. That’s why we’ve designed solutions that prioritize human-centric oversight, balancing the power of automation with the critical insights only people can provide.

What We Do
Velatir offers a comprehensive suite of tools that enable businesses to seamlessly incorporate human oversight into their AI-powered workflows. Our solutions are designed to help organizations make better, safer, and more informed decisions, while ensuring compliance with evolving regulations such as the EU AI Act.
fields.Long Business Description:
Our Key Features
	•	Human-in-the-Loop SDK: A lightweight, developer-friendly SDK that flags critical functions for human approval before execution.
	•	Approval Dashboard: A centralized interface for real-time decision monitoring, featuring rich data insights and notifications.
	•	Historical Decision Automation: Automates low-risk decisions based on historical patterns, with full transparency into why decisions are made.
	•	Compliance & Reporting Tools: Built-in tools aligned with Article 14 of the EU AI Act, ensuring every decision is auditable and traceable.
	•	Customizable Oversight Parameters: Tailored triggers and thresholds for oversight based on business-specific needs.
	•	AI Feedback Loop: Refines AI models by integrating human feedback to detect and mitigate biases.
	•	Seamless Integration: API-first design with support for popular frameworks and AI models for easy deployment.
Why Choose Velatir?
	•	Compliance-Driven by Design: We make regulatory adherence effortless, keeping your business aligned with legal and ethical standards.
	•	Trust and Transparency: Reduce risks and build confidence by ensuring human oversight for critical decisions.
	•	Scalable Automation: Transition to efficient, low-risk automation while maintaining full control.
	•	Cross-Industry Adaptability: Our solutions fit industries where high-stakes decisions are paramount, including healthcare, finance, and e-commerce.
	•	Plug-and-Play Simplicity: Get started quickly with minimal integration effort and intuitive tools.
	•	Future-Proof AI Governance: Stay ahead of evolving AI regulations and governance requirements.
Our Vision
We envision a world where AI operates responsibly, transparently, and collaboratively with humans. With Velatir, businesses don’t have to choose between innovation and accountability—they can achieve both.
Velatir – Empowering AI with Human Judgment: Oversight You Can Trust.

fields.Long Business Description:
AquilaX: AI-Driven Application Security for Modern Development
AquilaX is a next-generation AI-powered Application Security Platform (ASPM) designed to integrate security seamlessly into the software development lifecycle (SDLC). By leveraging advanced machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), AquilaX automates security code scanning, vulnerability management, and DevSecOps processes, enabling developers to build secure software without disrupting their workflow.
Key Offerings:
	•	AI-Powered Security Scanning: Runs 8+ parallel security scanners to detect vulnerabilities across source code, dependencies, containers, and infrastructure-as-code (IaC).
	•	Securitron AI Engine: A proprietary AI model trained on over 300 million open-source projects, capable of automating vulnerability triage, reducing false positives, and providing contextual remediation insights ￼.
	•	Comprehensive Security Coverage: Supports SAST, SCA, DAST, malware detection, API security, and compliance checks ￼.
	•	Developer-Friendly Security: Offers IDE integrations, CI/CD automation, and AI-powered chat assistance, enabling a frictionless DevSecOps experience ￼.
	•	Flexible Deployment Models: Available as a multi-tenant SaaS, isolated single-tenant instance, or private cloud/on-prem deployment ￼.
	•	Proactive Security Consultation: Provides expert DevSecOps consultation, application security training, and managed security services ￼.
AquilaX is trusted by global enterprises and leading development teams, having scanned over 10 billion lines of code and identified millions of vulnerabilities ￼. With cutting-edge AI automation, AquilaX is redefining application security—eliminating complexity, reducing costs, and delivering zero-noise vulnerability detection ￼.
For more information, visit AquilaX.ai.

fields.Business Description: Unit Tests on Autopilot. CodeBeaver highlights bugs and maintains Unit Tests.
fields.Long Business Description:
CodeBeaver writes and updates your unit tests. Not only that! It highlights bugs in your Pull Requests by running tests and checking out your code. It works natively with GitHub, GitLab and BitBucket. The onboarding takes 2 clicks! We currently help 30k GitHub stars and counting.
It’s Free for 14 days, then it’s $12 a month.  It’s free for open-source projects!
CodeBeaver - Unit Tests on Autopilot
CodeBeaver writes and updates your unit tests. Not only that! It highlights bugs in your Pull Requests by running tests and checking out your code.
It’s like hiring a junior developer who only focuses on unit tests. Free for 14 days, then it’s $12 a month. It works natively with GitHub, GitLab and BitBucket. Two clicks onboarding!
It’s free for open-source projects! We currently help 30k GitHub stars and counting.
How it works?
CodeBeaver is CI + LLM + your code. It runs your tests, check out the results.
It does 3 things:
If a test fails due to a bug in your code, it provides a detailed explanation of where the bug is. Super fast fixing!
If a test needs to be updated since your code changed, it writes an updated test and opens a new Pull Request.
If a test is not covering enough edge cases, or does not exist at all, CodeBeaver writes it and opens a new Pull Request
Why CodeBeaver?
Get the stability of Unit Testing without the hassle
Never maintain Unit Tests again!
Catch bugs with every Pull Request
Automatic edge case addition
Full control: CodeBeaver opens Pull Requests just like other devs in your team do, so you can review
Ship faster with less bugs!
How do I get started?
Go to codebeaver.ai and get a 14-days free trial, no credit card needed.
After that, it’s only $12 a month per developer. Or free if you are open-source!
What about security?
We take the security of your codebase very seriously. We are GDPR and SOC2 compliant. Learn more on our security page.
Frequently asked questions
Wait, won't it commit tests that pass for buggy code?
No. This is because CodeBeaver will write tests based on its understanding of how your function should work, not based on how you implemented it.
For CodeBeaver to have an understanding of your requirements, it's usually enough to write comments at the start of your function describing what it should do. You can check out this Pull Request to see it in action.
I like to write Unit Tests! Does this mean I don't need them anymore?
We like writing Unit Tests as much as you do! CodeBeaver will run and maintain existing tests, as well as extend the ones it finds. So you can go on and write Unit Tests, but you don't have to worry about covering all of the edge cases and all of the functions if you feel like it.
Which LLM models do you use?
We use Claude 3.5 Sonnet by Anthropic for agentic tasks and O3-mini from OpenAI for code generation. They are both GDPR and SOC 2 compliant.
What languages & frameworks do you support?
CodeBeaver is a general-purpose tool that can be used with any language and framework using a configuration file similar to Docker and GitHub Actions.
CodeBeaver will auto-configure itself for the most common frameworks such as Pytest, Unittest, Jest, Vitest, and more.
fields.Tags: devtool, CI, ai agent, github, unit tests, qa, development tool, gitlab, cicd, continuous integration, tests

fields.Business Description:
Advena is an innovative platform that revolutionizes the way people find and join projects. Our solution connects talented professionals, enthusiasts, and leaders with dynamic initiatives, enabling quick matching based on skills, interests, and technologies. With intelligent algorithms and an intuitive team management system, Advena simplifies the recruitment and collaboration process, supporting both individuals seeking new challenges and organizers of short-term ventures.

Our strategy focuses on building an engaged community through gamification, a rating and recommendation system, and an innovative approach to talent management. By leveraging content marketing, social media, and strategic partnerships, Advena aims to create a thriving ecosystem that empowers project leaders and participants alike. With long-term goals of global expansion and a premium version, Advena is set to become the go-to platform for agile, purpose-driven collaborations.
fields.Long Business Description:
Advena is an innovative digital platform designed to transform how people connect with projects and how project leaders build their teams. By bridging the gap between talent and opportunity, Advena provides a seamless and intelligent way to match individuals with initiatives that align with their skills, interests, and technological expertise. Whether you are a professional seeking new challenges, a freelancer looking for short-term gigs, or a project leader in need of the right people, Advena simplifies the process, making collaboration more efficient and rewarding.
Our Mission
Advena's mission is to empower individuals and teams by providing them with the right tools and opportunities to collaborate effectively. We believe that talent should never go unnoticed and that meaningful projects should have access to the skills they need to thrive. By leveraging smart matching algorithms and an intuitive user experience, we aim to create an ecosystem where innovation, creativity, and teamwork flourish.
How Advena Works
Advena operates as a dynamic matchmaking and project management platform:
Profile Creation – Users create detailed profiles showcasing their skills, interests, and experience.
Smart Matching System – Our advanced recommendation engine suggests relevant projects based on user profiles, ensuring optimal alignment between talent and initiatives.
Project Discovery & Participation – Users can explore, apply to, or be invited to projects that match their expertise.
Team & Project Management – Project leaders can manage teams, track progress, and engage with contributors within the platform.
Gamification & Ratings – A structured rating and gamification system incentivizes engagement, fosters trust, and rewards contributions.
What Sets Advena Apart?
Skill-Based Matching – Unlike traditional job boards, Advena focuses on short-term initiatives and agile project-based work, ensuring that users find relevant, impactful opportunities.
Community-Driven Approach – We cultivate a thriving network of professionals, freelancers, and innovators who actively collaborate and support each other.
Gamification & Engagement – By incorporating gamification elements, leaderboards, and achievement-based incentives, we keep users motivated and engaged.
Integrated Project Management – Beyond matchmaking, Advena offers essential tools to help teams collaborate efficiently and track project progress.
Scalability & Growth Potential – Designed with global expansion in mind, Advena plans to introduce premium features, enterprise solutions, and localized versions tailored to different industries.
Market Opportunity & Growth Strategy

fields.Business Description:
Enbodie is combining smartphone technology, advanced AI, & clinically validated toxicology data to provide personalised insights into skin conditions & product safety by analysing advanced health markers like stress, dehydration, and cholesterol indicators. 

Enbodie addresses significant gaps &  inefficiencies in personal care, exposure to harmful ingredients, and the lack of inclusivity in dermatological solutions. 

Personal care today is often impersonal, invasive & inaccessible. Many widely used products contain harmful ingredients such as hormone blockers, cancer-linked substances, and “forever chemicals,” leaving consumers unable to make informed decisions. 

Additionally, long waiting times and high costs make professional dermatological care unavailable to many. Businesses also face challenges in developing safe, sustainable, and effective products due to outdated practices and insufficient data. 

Enbodie’s AI-powered platform bridges these gaps by enabling users to scan their skin using a smartphone to detect conditions such as eczema, rosacea, psoriasis, and melanoma. The platform also analyses daily routines, reviewing the safety of products and ingredients using clinically validated toxicology data from a global Clinical Research Organisation. Adhering to UK/EU Margin of Safety standards ensures users receive reliable, science-backed insights. Enbodie’s B2B marketplace further connects brands, suppliers, and consumers, driving sustainable innovation, ingredient up-cycling, & ethical product development. 

Since launching its preview on 21 January 2025, Enbodie has delivered remarkable results to over 100 ethnically diverse & gender-varied users such as a 30–50% reduction in exposure to harmful ingredients, 15–20% fewer routine ingredients, in excess of 80% improvement in ESG / Sustainability footprint and up to 30% annual savings by switching to healthier, affordable alternatives. 

Enbodie harmonises planetary care with self care, empowering individuals with personalised insights while enabling businesses to innovate sustainably.

agriBIOME improves the resilience and yield of crops in agriculture through specific, natural, microbial and GMO-free solutions and can thus reduce the use of fertilizers and pesticides. This promotes more sustainable and at the same time more efficient agriculture and supports security of supply. 
Microbiomes are microorganisms such as bacteria and fungi. These microorganisms play a crucial role in nature for plant and animal health and growth.
fields.Long Business Description:
The use of chemical fertilizers, pesticides, and herbicides is often neccessary to maintain the farm's yield to guarantee food security and thus make ends meet financially but it disrupts the natural soil microbiome, reducing the diversity and abundance of beneficial microbes, which leads to poor quality and health issues such as increased cancer risks - at the same time the high usage of antibiotics in livestock, which leads to lower (animal) health and welfare and increased antibiotic resistance is a huge issue in terms of food security and growing population. 
agriBIOME improves the resilience and yield of crops in agriculture and animal health and welfare through specific, natural, microbial and GMO-free solutions and can thus reduce the use of fertilizers and pesticides but also the usage of antibiotics in livestock.
With our solution we naturally fill the gap of missing microbiomes in plants by growin special live worms carrying specific microbiomes adapted to the corresponding grain variety: When the vermicompost is liquidized and administered to plants studies have shown a significantly better nutrient supply, strong growth promotion, better disease defense and improved stress resistance, while worms can be fed once per fattening cycle to young animals right at the beginning of the rearing period to transfer complex microbiota to support their eubiosis.
In contrast to other solutions, we pursue a scalable and natural approach, scientifically proven with a circularity and a zero waste approach based on microbiological solutions protected by patents.
fields.Tags: agriculture, food security, crop resilience, animal health

By decoupling visual encoding into separate pathways while maintaining a unified transformer architecture, it addresses previous limitations in AI models. This design enhances flexibility and performance, enabling the model to excel in tasks involving both text and image data. Recent benchmarks have shown that Janus-Pro-7B outperforms OpenAI's DALL-E 3 and Stability AI's Stable Diffusion in text-to-image generation tasks.

Why Students Love Tutorly.sg
Always-On Support:
Struggling with math late at night or preparing for an exam last-minute? Tutorly.sg is there anytime your child needs help, ensuring no question goes unanswered.
Personalized Learning:
Unlike group tuition, Tutorly.sg focuses entirely on the student. It tailors answers to their specific needs, making every interaction meaningful and effective.

No Pressure, Just Learning:
Students can learn at their own pace, revisiting topics and practicing as much as they need without the fear of judgment.
Why Parents Love Tutorly.sg
Your AI Tutor, Anytime:
Say goodbye to rigid tuition schedules. With Tutorly.sg, your child gets instant answers to their questions anytime, day or night. Whether it’s math struggles at midnight or a quick science recap, Tutorly.sg is always there.
100% Aligned with the MOE Syllabus:
No guesswork. Every subject, question, and resource is tailored to Singapore’s school curriculum, ensuring your child gets exactly what they need to succeed.
Exam Confidence, Built-In:
With exam papers for various subjects for every level, your child can practice endlessly and walk into every test prepared and confident.
Affordable Excellence:
Traditional tuition can cost SGD 200–500/month. For just SGD 49/month, Tutorly.sg delivers the same high-quality support at a fraction of the price.
Try Before You Pay:
Experience Tutorly.sg fore free without signing up or sharing any payment details. No commitment—just pure learning. See the results before deciding. Even if you decide to subscribe, you can cancel anytime.
How Does Tutorly.sg Compare with Traditional Tuition Centres?
Feature	Tutorly.sg	Traditional Tuition Centres
Cost	SGD 49/month for unlimited access	SGD 200–500/month
Availability	24/7, anytime your child needs help	Fixed schedules
Learning Pace	Flexible, self-paced learning	One-size-fits-all approach in group settings
Convenience	Learn from anywhere—no travel required	Requires travel to the tuition centre
Focus	Tailored to the student’s specific questions and needs	Generalized teaching for the entire group
Resources	Exam papers, study notes, and instant AI assistance	Limited to the tutor’s expertise
With Tutorly.sg, students get the support they need, exactly when they need it—without the high costs or rigid schedules of traditional tuition.
How Tutorly.sg Can Help Students Improve Their Grades
Unlimited Practice:
Access to a wide range of exam papers ensures students have ample opportunities to practice and perfect their skills.
Immediate Answers:
With 24/7 AI assistance, students don’t have to wait for their next tuition class to get help. They can resolve doubts instantly and move forward with confidence.
Aligned with MOE Syllabus:
Tutorly.sg follows the same syllabus as schools, ensuring students focus on what truly matters for their exams.
Consistent Learning:
Unlike tuition that happens once or twice a week, Tutorly.sg ensures continuous support, helping students build and retain knowledge effectively.
Engaged Learning:
The platform’s user-friendly design keeps students focused and motivated, turning study time into productive time.
Who Is Tutorly.sg Perfect For?
Parents Looking for an Affordable Alternative to Tuition:
Save money while giving your child access to a powerful AI tutor and tons of practice resources.
Families Who Want Extra Support for Their Kids:
Even with tuition, Tutorly.sg works as a perfect study companion to reinforce concepts and boost confidence.

- Record fuzzy thoughts and have Notis summarize them, polish them, and organize them for you.
- Record a meeting and ask Notis to write the minutes and send you a draft to your email.
- Keep track of all your tasks and todos. Notis can organize your tasks by area, project, location, etc. Simply ask what tasks you can complete at home or what tasks are left on a particular project with a deadline before Friday, etc.
- Transcribe your business cards, expenses, or anything else, and store them correctly. Notis understands your Notion database and can edit any fields for you.
- Find any information buried in your Notion and query any Notion databases. ""What was that tool that converted articles to podcasts again?"" ""How much did I spend in restaurants during my last business trip in S.A?"".
Notis comes out with a full second-brain Notion template to manage every aspect of your life, but it also understands any Notion templates or database. You can create infinite workflows powered by your voice, text, and images in your Notion workspace with zero coding—just your dedicated AI intern.

fields.Business Description:

Key Features:

✅ Code Interpretation – AI clarifies complex regulations, making them easier to understand.

fields.Long Business Description:
**ArchCode** is an innovative AI-powered platform created to streamline the process of navigating building codes and technical regulations for architects, engineers, and construction professionals in Spain. The platform uses advanced artificial intelligence to interpret technical questions in natural language, providing instant, precise answers to complex regulatory queries. This feature not only saves time but also reduces the risk of errors, allowing professionals to focus on their projects without getting bogged down by intricate legal and regulatory details.
In addition to its smart search capabilities, ArchCode offers tools like **PDF document validation**, which allows users to download and verify official technical documents to confirm they are up-to-date and meet compliance requirements. The platform also provides **personalized code recommendations** based on the specific needs of each project, further enhancing its utility.
ArchCode covers all levels of Spanish building codes, from **national regulations** to **regional codes** specific to Spain’s autonomous communities. This wide-ranging coverage ensures that professionals working in different regions can easily access the most relevant and up-to-date construction regulations.
With real-time updates and the ability to compare different building codes, ArchCode helps users stay on top of any changes in construction laws. Whether reviewing compliance or working on a new design, ArchCode offers a seamless, efficient solution for professionals in the architecture, engineering, and construction industries.
By simplifying access to critical regulatory information, ArchCode saves valuable time, enhances productivity, and promotes smoother project execution, making it an indispensable tool for the Spanish construction sector.

fields.Business Description: Escape Road is an exhilarating driving game where you must evade relentless police chases and navigate through challenging obstacles. Your ultimate goal is to survive as long as possible while racking up points!
fields.Long Business Description: Escape Road is an exhilarating online driving game that immerses players in high-speed chases, where the primary objective is to evade relentless police forces while navigating through a variety of challenging terrains. The game is accessible via the website escaperoad.app and offers a thrilling experience for players of all ages.  Game Overview  Gameplay Mechanics  Players control their vehicles using keyboard inputs, specifically the arrow keys or A/D keys, to maneuver through obstacles and dodge pursuing police cars. Mastery of these controls is essential for successful escapes. The game features up to 90 unique vehicles, each with distinct attributes, allowing players to choose vehicles that align with their escaping strategies.  Visual and Audio Experience  Escape Road boasts visually stunning environments, meticulously designed to enhance the excitement of high-speed pursuits. The sound design includes lively sound effects that amplify the adrenaline rush during chases, contributing to an immersive gaming experience.  Features  Dynamic Gameplay: Fluid mechanics allow for seamless navigation through chaotic environments, ensuring sustained excitement. Realistic Driving Mechanics: Precise steering and acceleration controls enhance immersion and engagement. Community Challenges: Players can participate in events to earn rewards and compare scores globally, fostering a competitive atmosphere.  Getting Started  To embark on your adventure in Escape Road, follow these steps:  Launch the Game: Visit escaperoad.app and click 'Play' to begin. Choose Your Vehicle: Select from a variety of vehicles tailored for different escape scenarios. Start Your Escape: Use your keyboard to navigate, dodging police cars and obstacles while accumulating points.  Player Feedback  Players have expressed their enthusiasm for Escape Road:  John Doe describes it as "an insatiable thrill," highlighting the excitement of the chase. Jane Smith appreciates the variety of vehicles, noting that it makes every session unique. Alex Johnson emphasizes the graphics and sound effects that immerse players in action.  Frequently Asked Questions  What is Escape Road?  An exhilarating driving game focused on evading police chases while navigating obstacles.    How do I control my vehicle?  Use arrow keys or A/D keys on your keyboard for movement.    Is it free to play?  Yes, but optional in-game purchases are available for exclusive content.    Can I play on mobile devices?  Yes, Escape Road is compatible with both desktop and mobile browsers.    Are there community features?  Players can engage in community events and challenges to earn rewards and compare scores. Yes, Escape Road is compatible with both desktop and mobile browsers.  Are there community features?  Players can engage in community events and challenges to earn rewards and compare scores.  Escape Road combines thrilling gameplay with engaging mechanics, making it a must-try for fans of driving games. Whether you're looking for a casual gaming experience or a competitive challenge, Escape Road offers something for everyone.

fields.Business Description:
Share Your Party is an innovative app that simplifies event planning and participation. It connects organizers with attendees, offering tools for seamless event creation, ticket sales, and real-time updates. With personalized event recommendations, sustainable practices like digital tickets, and features like rideshare coordination, we make every event effortless and eco-friendly. 

Starting in Austria and expanding across Europe, our scalable platform aims to transform how people connect and celebrate. Whether you’re hosting a private party or a public festival, Share Your Party is your go-to solution for successful, memorable events.
fields.Long Business Description:
Share Your Party is a dynamic platform designed to transform the way events are planned, promoted, and experienced. The app bridges the gap between event organizers and participants, offering a streamlined and user-friendly interface that caters to both personal gatherings and large-scale public events. With its emphasis on simplicity, sustainability, and scalability, Share Your Party redefines the event management landscape.
Core Features and Offerings
The platform provides organizers with intuitive tools to create, manage, and promote their events efficiently. Key features include:
Event Listing and Management: Easy setup and customization of events, including descriptions, schedules, and images.
Ticket Sales and Payment Integration: Secure and seamless payment options for attendees, with multiple payment methods like credit cards, PayPal, and instant transfers.
Real-Time Updates: Notifications and updates for attendees about event changes or important announcements.
Participant Engagement: Options for attendees to communicate, form groups, and organize rideshares to events.
Analytics for Organizers: Insights into ticket sales, attendance forecasts, and user engagement to optimize future events.
Participants benefit from personalized event recommendations based on their preferences and location, ensuring a tailored experience that maximizes event discovery and engagement.
Sustainability and Innovation
Share Your Party is committed to promoting sustainable practices in the event industry. By digitizing event management processes, the app reduces the need for physical tickets, flyers, and other paper materials. It encourages efficient resource use and minimizes environmental impact, making it a forward-thinking solution for the modern world.
Revenue Model
The business operates on a tiered commission system, where fees are applied to ticketed events based on ticket price ranges:
For tickets priced at €1–50, a 5% fee for organizers and a 4% fee for participants are applied.
For tickets priced at €100–200, the fees decrease slightly to 4% for organizers and 3% for participants.
Additional revenue streams include:
Premium Listings: Organizers can pay for featured placement of their events on the platform.
Subscription Plans: Regular organizers can subscribe for reduced fees and added benefits.
Data Insights Services: Providing organizers with advanced analytics for a fee.
Market and Expansion
Initially launching in Austria, Share Your Party targets university students, local communities, and established event organizers. The expansion plan includes targeting major European event hubs such as Berlin, Amsterdam, and Ibiza, focusing on vibrant social and cultural hubs to build a loyal user base.
Vision and Mission
The vision of Share Your Party is to become the leading platform for seamless, sustainable, and engaging event experiences. Its mission is to empower organizers and attendees by providing innovative tools that simplify event planning, foster community connections, and promote eco-friendly practices.
Future Outlook
With its scalable business model, user-centric design, and commitment to sustainability, Share Your Party is poised to disrupt the event management industry. By addressing the needs of organizers and participants alike, the platform creates a mutually beneficial ecosystem that ensures long-term success and growth in both local and international markets.
fields.Tags: party, event planning, social community, app

SubtitlesDog is an advanced AI-powered subtitle translation tool designed to provide quick and high-quality translation services for video content. Supporting over 100 languages and multiple subtitle formats such as SRT, VTT, SSA, and ASS, SubtitlesDog is an ideal choice for content creators, businesses, and educators looking to reach global audiences.
Key Features
  1.  AI Translation Model Options
  • Users can choose from various AI models to match specific styles and tones, ensuring accurate, contextually appropriate translations.
  2.  Expert-Level Prompts
  • Pre-configured professional prompts tailored to specialized content (e.g., legal, technical) enhance translation precision and relevance.
  3.  Batch Upload and Processing
  • Users can upload and process multiple subtitle files simultaneously, saving time and improving workflow efficiency.
  4.  Customizable Output Formats
  • SubtitlesDog supports single-language or bilingual subtitles, with options to customize output formats based on project needs.
  5.  Perfect Timeline Synchronization
  • The platform ensures precise subtitle-to-video alignment, guaranteeing a seamless viewing experience.
  6.  Security and Privacy
  • All files are encrypted during processing, ensuring strict data security and confidentiality.
Use Cases
  1.  Content Creators
  • SubtitlesDog enables YouTubers, filmmakers, and other creators to translate videos into multiple languages, significantly broadening their audience reach.
  2.  Corporate Training
  • The tool facilitates multilingual subtitle translation for training materials, enhancing communication across global teams.
  3.  Educational Platforms
  • Online learning platforms can use SubtitlesDog to translate video courses into various languages, increasing inclusivity and accessibility for learners worldwide.
FAQs
  1.  What is SubtitlesDog, and how does it work?
  • SubtitlesDog is an AI-driven subtitle translation platform where users can upload files, choose a translation model, and receive high-quality outputs in minutes.
  2.  What languages are supported?
  • It supports over 100 languages, including widely spoken and rare dialects.
  3.  Can I translate multiple files at once?
  • Yes, the batch upload feature allows users to translate multiple files simultaneously.
  4.  What subtitle formats are compatible?
  • Compatible formats include .srt, .vtt, .ass, and .sub, ensuring usability across diverse platforms and media players.
  5.  What is the “Expert-Level Prompts” feature?
  • This feature offers specialized translation options for professional domains, ensuring high-quality and domain-specific translations.

fields.Business Description: PageSnap.co is a SaaS platform offering developers a powerful API for converting web pages to PDFs with pixel-perfect accuracy. It features over 30 customization options, AWS S3 integration, and reliable serverless architecture, making it an ideal choice for scalable, automated PDF generation.
fields.Long Business Description:
PageSnap.co is a Software as a Service (SaaS) platform that provides developers with a robust API for converting web pages into PDFs with high precision. Leveraging Chrome's rendering engine, it ensures that the output mirrors the exact appearance of the web page as seen in the Chrome browser, delivering pixel-perfect accuracy in every conversion. 
The platform offers over 30 customizable options, allowing users to tailor PDFs to their specific needs. Features include the ability to modify headers and footers, inject custom CSS and JavaScript, add watermarks, and control advanced wait times. Additionally, PageSnap.co supports batch PDF conversion with webhook notifications, enabling efficient processing of large-scale requests. Users can choose to store their generated PDFs securely in their own AWS S3 buckets or utilize PageSnap's storage, where files are retained for two days before deletion. 
Built on AWS serverless architecture, PageSnap.co ensures reliability with a 99% uptime guarantee. The service offers a free plan with up to 60 credits per month, allowing users to start automating their PDF generation without any initial cost. Paid plans are available for those requiring higher volumes, with the flexibility to purchase multiple plans simultaneously and cancel at any time. 
In summary, PageSnap.co is a comprehensive solution for developers seeking accurate and customizable website-to-PDF conversion capabilities, backed by robust infrastructure and flexible pricing options.

fields.Business Description:
Observability & Code Profiling for Distributed Systems
BitDive delivers real-time code-level observability for Java-based distributed systems, enabling instant root cause analysis and performance optimization through continuous low-overhead profiling. Ideal for developers, and performance-focused enterprises.
fields.Long Business Description:
BitDive is a cutting-edge performance profiling tool that offers a new integrated, flexible, and low-overhead approach to application profiling. Unlike traditional Java profiling methods (JVM-based), BitDive leverages a library-based method, making it developer-friendly and well-suited for modern application architectures and development practices.
BitDive addresses a wide range of enterprise use cases including low-overhead continuous profiling, real-time monitoring, and error tracking, providing deep code-level insights combined with production-safe operation. BitDive is designed to be resource-efficient, easy to operate and scale, requires no code changes, and works seamlessly across all codebases.
Key Features
-Integration via simple Maven dependency addition in pom.xml and minimal configuration through a YAML file
-Easy setup with zero code changes (auto-instrumentation)
-No JVM restart required for configuration changes
-Designed for ease of use, making it approachable for developers with varying skill levels
-Supports long-term, continuous profiling in production environments
-Low (very low) overhead due to in-process monitoring
-Optimized support for microservices and distributed systems
-Support multithreading and asynchronous task monitoring
-Detailed application-level metrics including:
--method input arguments, return values for rapid root cause analysis and performance optimization
--error information for real-time monitoring and debugging
--database queries for a lot more insights
-Built-in tools for performance analysis and application visualization:
-Automatic dependency mapping for modeling application services
-Call tree visualization to illustrate method invocation sequences
-Flame Graphs to identify bottlenecks within the call hierarchy for optimization
-Supports selective monitoring for specific modules or services
-Well-suited for scaling in containerized and cloud-native applications
-Works well with modern development practices (CI/CD, microservice architecture)
fields.Tags: Developer tools, Application monitoring, Observability, Performance optimization, Java profiling

fields.Business Description: The PC Bottleneck Calculator is a professional hardware performance testing tool that helps users quickly identify computer performance bottlenecks and provides optimal optimization solutions.
fields.Long Business Description:
A PC Bottleneck Calculator is a tool designed to help users identify potential compatibility and performance issues within their PC systems. By analyzing key components such as the processor (CPU), graphics processing unit (GPU), random access memory (RAM), and screen resolution, it can assess the degree of performance matching between these hardware elements. The core function of the bottleneck calculator is to compare the performance capabilities of these components to determine the efficiency of their collaborative operation. For instance, if a CPU’s processing speed cannot keep up with the data processing demands of the GPU, or if the RAM capacity is insufficient for the current data processing tasks, the bottleneck calculator can pinpoint these bottlenecks and suggest possible solutions.
However, it is important to note that the results provided by the bottleneck calculator are not entirely precise, as factors such as software optimization, thermal throttling, and manufacturing variances can all affect actual performance. Additionally, with updates to software or drivers, the assessment of system performance can change over time, highlighting the necessity for continuous monitoring and adjustment. Despite these limitations, the bottleneck calculator remains a valuable reference, offering PC users a starting point to understand potential bottleneck issues and to conduct more in-depth research or manual testing before considering hardware upgrades or system configuration adjustments.

Kultrip is a travel companion platform that transforms travelers' experiences by connecting users with destinations and activities inspired by movies, books, and TV series. fields.Long Business Description:
Kultrip is a travel companion platform that transforms travelers' experiences by connecting users with destinations and activities inspired by movies, books, and TV series. The goal is to simplify the planning of these themed trips through personalized recommendations and advanced exploration tools, such as immersive and interactive maps and augmented reality. It also facilitates the booking of activities, tours, and museum tickets and offers discounts and vouchers for businesses near the user’s itinerary.
Kultrip provides an innovative business model in the tourism sector with two main revenue streams: B2C and B2B.
B2C Component: The platform features thematic travel guides that allow users to discover iconic locations from movies, series, and books. These guides are available individually and include detailed information about key spots for travelers to immerse themselves in their favorite stories. Kultrip employs a SaaS subscription model with three tiers: Free, Basic, and Premium.
Free Plan: Provides static guides with fixed maps, written information, and illustrative photos.
Basic Plan: Includes advanced functionalities such as GPS-enabled interactive maps, audio guides, and augmented reality.
Premium Plan: Offers all Basic Plan features plus exclusive discounts at local restaurants, shops, and attractions.
B2B Component: Kultrip partners with local businesses to enhance their visibility on its platform. In the Premium model, Kultrip negotiates discounts and earns commissions for transactions or used discounts.
Competitive Advantages
Kultrip stands out as the only platform focused on travel inspired by books, movies, and TV series. Unlike competitors like GetYourGuide, TripAdvisor, or Lonely Planet, Kultrip centers the narrative in the travel experience. The platform provides:
Interactive Maps: GPS-enabled navigation to story-related locations.
Augmented Reality: Overlays iconic scenes onto real-world destinations.
Audio Guides: Thematic explanations of each site’s relevance within the original work.
This unique focus turns travel into an emotional, immersive experience, offering value for both travelers and local businesses.

fields.Business Description: A Digital wedding guestbook for messages, photos, videos, and memories
fields.Long Business Description:
Wedding Capsule is a modern digital guestbook and memory collection tool that replaces traditional guestbooks with an interactive, all-in-one solution. It collects heartfelt messages, photos, videos, and voice recordings from guests, organizing them into a dynamic timeline. Guests can easily participate using QR codes and familiar platforms like WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, or a web browser—no app download required.
Key Features:
- Interactive Guestbook: Guests share messages, photos, videos, and voice notes, creating a complete memory collection.
- Real-Time Timeline: All contributions appear instantly in a beautiful, organized timeline.
- Effortless Access: Custom-designed QR codes, placed on invitations, menus, or table cards, provide instant guest access.
- WhatsApp and Messenger Integration: Guests can contribute using platforms they already know, making it easy for everyone.
- Post-Wedding Reminders: Automated follow-ups ensure guests upload any additional photos and videos.
- Fun Photo and Video Missions: Creative tasks like “Take a selfie with the couple!” make participation engaging and fun.
Benefits:
Wedding Capsule solves the chaos of collecting wedding memories by centralizing them in one place. Couples receive a complete keepsake that includes messages, photos, and even emotional voice notes. Photo and video missions create unique moments, while the platform’s simplicity ensures even less tech-savvy guests can contribute effortlessly.
How It Works:
- Setup: Couples customize QR codes matching their wedding theme and place them on invitations, menus, or at the venue.
- During the Wedding: Guests scan the QR codes to access the guestbook and share memories instantly via WhatsApp, Messenger, or browser.
- After the Wedding: Automated reminders prompt guests to upload additional photos and videos they may have missed.
- The Final Keepsake: All contributions are organized into a downloadable timeline, preserving the wedding’s full story.
Wedding Capsule is more than a guestbook—it’s a memory collection system that turns your wedding into a timeless keepsake. From heartfelt messages to funny videos, it captures every angle of your special day. Perfect for modern couples, it ensures no moment is missed.
