Introducing Notebooklm Podcast: Transform Text into Engaging Conversations
We are thrilled to announce the launch of our groundbreaking product: Notebooklm Podcast. This innovative tool is set to revolutionize content creation by transforming any text into dynamic, engaging podcast-style conversations.
What is Notebooklm Podcast?
Notebooklm Podcast is an AI-powered platform that converts written content into lively, two-person dialogue podcasts. It's designed for content creators, educators, businesses, and anyone looking to make their text more accessible and engaging.
Key Features
AI-Powered Text-to-Dialogue Conversion: Our advanced AI algorithms transform your text into natural-sounding conversations.
Customizable Voices: Choose from a variety of voices to suit your content's tone and style.
Multi-Language Support: Generate podcasts in multiple languages to reach a global audience.
Easy Integration: Seamlessly integrate with your existing content workflow.
One-Click Audio Generation: Transform your text into audio with just a single click.
Adjustable Podcast Length: Customize the length of your podcast to fit your needs.
High-Quality Audio Output: Enjoy crisp, clear audio for a professional listening experience.
How It Works
Input Your Text: Simply paste your content into our user-friendly interface.
Customize Settings: Choose your preferred voices, language, and podcast length.
Generate: Click the "Generate Podcast" button and let our AI work its magic.
Listen and Download: Your podcast will be ready in minutes, available for immediate listening or download.
Who Can Benefit?
Content Creators: Transform blog posts, articles, and stories into engaging audio content.
Educators: Convert lectures and study materials into interactive learning experiences.
Businesses: Turn reports, newsletters, and updates into easily digestible audio formats.
Authors: Create audio previews or summaries of your books to attract more readers.
Marketers: Repurpose written content into podcast form for broader audience reach.
Why Choose Notebooklm Podcast?
Save Time: Automate the process of creating dialogue-based content.
Increase Engagement: Make your content more accessible and entertaining.
Reach New Audiences: Tap into the growing podcast listener base.
Improve Accessibility: Make your content available to those who prefer or require audio formats.
Enhance Learning: Convert educational materials into more engaging formats for better retention.
Getting Started
Ready to transform your text into captivating conversations? Visit our podcast generation page to create your first AI-generated podcast today!
Join Our Community
Become part of the Notebooklm Podcast community:
Subscribe to our podcast on your favorite platform
Follow us on social media for updates and discussions
Participate in our online forums and live Q&A sessions
Attend our virtual and in-person events

Conclusion
Notebooklm Podcast is more than just a text-to-speech tool; it's a content transformation platform that brings your words to life. Whether you're looking to enhance your content strategy, improve educational materials, or simply explore new ways of engaging your audience, Notebooklm Podcast offers a unique and powerful solution.

fields.Business Description: It's like ChatGPT for your Amazon PPC data.  Ask questions in plain English, get answers fast.
fields.Long Business Description:
Tired of wrestling with complex Amazon PPC data?
askPPC is the easiest, fastest, most intuitive ways to get the answers you need about your Amazon ad campaigns.  It's borderline addictive. It's like having a PPC expert at your fingertips, minus the complexity. No more endless clicking or drowning in spreadsheets. Just ask, and receive comprehensive, user-friendly answers in seconds.
How Does It Work?
1. Data Collection: Once you connect your Amazon Advertising account, askPPC performs an initial download of your advertising history. After that, it automatically updates your data every 24 hours, ensuring you always have the most current information at your fingertips and enabling you to query up to 12 months of your data (depending on your plan)
2. Ask Your Question: Simply type your query in plain English. No need for complex database queries or specialized jargon - just ask like you're talking to a human.  Explore your data to discover the secrets to increased profitability.
3. AI-Powered Analysis: Our advanced AI processes your question and analyzes your Amazon data to find the answer.
4. Quick Results: In most cases, you'll receive your answer in well under 20 seconds. The exact time depends on the complexity of your question, but our continuous improvements mean it's getting faster all the time.
5. Clear Presentation: Your results appear in a clean, easy-to-read table. You can sort and filter this table to focus on specific aspects of the data.
Need to dig deeper still? Simply download your results as a CSV file for further analysis in your preferred spreadsheet software.
And your precious advertising data is always 100% secure because none of it is ever shared with external AI models.

At CI|RQUEL we are redefining the future of fashion reverse logistics by combining cutting-edge AI-powered SaaS technology with hands-on management at strategically localized warehouses and end-to-end orchestration of unwanted items including returns, dead-stock, overstock and samples.
fields.Long Business Description: We specialize in managing the lifecycle of fashion returns. Once an item is returned by the end-consumer, we ensure a seamless process from start to finish. Our end-to-end solution gives brands peace of mind and the ability to focus on their core business. 1. Our AI-powered computer vision technology streamlines the return process by quickly evaluating each item’s condition and grade. This accelerates sorting, improves accuracy, and reduces errors, enabling faster decisions on restocking or repurposing items. 2. Through our trusted partner network, after precise quality check we take care of cleaning, and repairing each garment as needed. This ensures high standards and fast turnaround, allowing for ultra-fast restocking or repurposing of returned garment. 3. Our precise quality checks and rapid cleaning and repairs, ensuring quick restocking or repurposing through partner rental and resale platform as well as our own one - CIRQUEL. This efficiency minimizes storage costs and allows us to monetize brands’ returned items swiftly, maximizing their value with minimal delay. 4. We provide eco-friendly recycling for garments at the end of their lifecycle, ensuring responsible disposal to minimize environmental impact. Our service includes precise CO2 calculations and adherence to EU legislation, guaranteeing sustainability in every process. To sum up: CIRQUEL aims to simplify and accelerate the processing of returns, deadstock, and prototypes for brands, transforming potential losses into new revenue streams. We leverage AI-powered inspection technology and local partnerships to ensure fast, efficient, and sustainable handling. In the long term, our vision is to revolutionize the fashion industry by promoting circularity, reducing waste, and creating a global impact through localized, eco-friendly solutions.
fields.Tags: fashion returns, repurposing unwanted garment, SaaS and local orchestration of returns

fields.Business Description: An open source DevOps tool that packages and versions your AI/ML model, datasets, code, and configuration into a reproducible artifact called a ModelKit
fields.Long Business Description:
KitOps is a packaging, versioning, and sharing system for AI/ML projects that uses open standards so it works with the AI/ML, development, and DevOps tools you are already using, and can be stored in your enterprise container registry. It's AI/ML platform engineering teams' preferred solution for securely packaging and versioning assets.
KitOps creates a ModelKit for your AI/ML project which includes everything you need to reproduce it locally or deploy it into production. You can even selectively unpack a ModelKit so different team members can save time and storage space by only grabbing what they need for a task. Because ModelKits are immutable, signable, and live in your existing container registry they're easy for organizations to track, control, and audit.
ModelKits simplify the handoffs between data scientists, application developers, and SREs working with LLMs and other AI/ML models. Teams and enterprises use KitOps as a secure storage throughout the AI/ML project lifecycle.
Use KitOps to speed up and de-risk all types of AI/ML projects:
Predictive models
Large language models
Computer vision models
Multi-modal models
Audio models
etc...

fields.Business Description: Sourcely is an AI-powered platform designed to optimize the academic research process. Catering to students, researchers, and professionals, it simplifies the discovery of credible sources, automates citation generation, and provides concise, AI-generated summaries. By streamlining these essential tasks, Sourcely helps users save time, enhance the quality of their work, and improve research productivity. With access to over 200 million scholarly papers and advanced search filters, Sourcely offers a comprehensive solution for anyone looking to conduct efficient, high-quality academic research.
fields.Long Business Description:
Sourcely is an innovative AI-powered platform crafted to streamline the academic research process for students, researchers, and professionals. In today’s fast-paced academic world, conducting thorough research, generating accurate citations, and summarizing complex papers can be time-consuming and challenging. Sourcely leverages cutting-edge artificial intelligence to address these pain points, providing users with an efficient and comprehensive tool that enhances productivity and improves the quality of their academic work.
With access to over 200 million scholarly papers from a wide range of academic disciplines, Sourcely enables users to easily find credible and relevant sources for their research. Through its advanced search features, users can filter results by keywords, authors, publication dates, and more, ensuring they discover the most pertinent resources.
One of Sourcely’s standout features is its automated citation generation. Users can instantly generate citations in multiple formats—including APA, MLA, Chicago, and more—saving valuable time and ensuring proper attribution without the need for manual formatting. This feature is a game-changer for those who need to manage extensive bibliographies or work on time-sensitive projects.
Another key feature is Sourcely’s ability to summarize long academic papers into concise, digestible overviews. The AI-powered summarization tool scans through lengthy documents and extracts key insights, allowing users to quickly grasp the main points without sifting through pages of text. This capability is ideal for literature reviews, thesis writing, and research planning.
Additionally, Sourcely’s AI-driven feedback feature allows users to upload their drafts or research papers to receive tailored suggestions for improvement. This includes recommendations for citation placement, content clarity, and overall structure, helping users refine their work before submission.
Overall, Sourcely is designed to empower academics by automating time-consuming tasks and offering powerful tools to enhance the quality of research. Whether you are a student working on an essay, a researcher conducting a systematic review, or a professional preparing a thesis, Sourcely is the ultimate tool for accelerating research, boosting productivity, and ensuring academic excellence.
fields.Tags: AI research tool, academic research, citation generation

fields.Business Description: Create and share memories effortlessly with your dedicated digital event album. No app, sign-up, or download required. Just share the link or let guests scan a QR code. Perfect for weddings, birthdays, memorials, and all celebrations!
LobeChat brings you the best chat UI experience for ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini and Local LLM, with Multimodal / Plugin / Artifacts / Knowledge Base and so on.
fields.Long Business Description:
LobeChat - An open-source, modern-design ChatGPT/LLMs UI/Framework. Supports speech-synthesis, multi-modal, and extensible plugin system.
One-click **FREE** deployment of your private OpenAI ChatGPT/Claude/Gemini/Groq/Ollama chat application.
Features
### 1. Multi-Model Service Provider Support
In the continuous development of LobeChat, we deeply understand the importance of diversity in model service providers for meeting the needs of the community when providing AI conversation services. Therefore, we have expanded our support to multiple model service providers, rather than being limited to a single one, in order to offer users a more diverse and rich selection of conversations.
In this way, LobeChat can more flexibly adapt to the needs of different users, while also providing developers with a wider range of choices.
#### Supported Model Service Providers
We have implemented support for the following model service providers:
- **AWS Bedrock**: Integrated with AWS Bedrock service, supporting models such as **Claude / LLama2**, providing powerful natural language processing capabilities.
- **Anthropic (Claude)**: Accessed Anthropic's **Claude** series models, including Claude 3 and Claude 2, with breakthroughs in multi-modal capabilities and extended context, setting a new industry benchmark.
- **Google AI (Gemini Pro, Gemini Vision)**: Access to Google's **Gemini** series models, including Gemini and Gemini Pro, to support advanced language understanding and generation.
- **ChatGLM**: Added the **ChatGLM** series models from Zhipuai (GLM-4/GLM-4-vision/GLM-3-turbo), providing users with another efficient conversation model choice.
- **Moonshot AI (Dark Side of the Moon)**: Integrated with the Moonshot series models, an innovative AI startup from China, aiming to provide deeper conversation understanding.
- **Groq**: Accessed Groq's AI models, efficiently processing message sequences and generating responses, capable of multi-turn dialogues and single-interaction tasks.
- **OpenRouter**: Supports routing of models including **Claude 3**, **Gemma**, **Mistral**, **Llama2** and **Cohere**, with intelligent routing optimization to improve usage efficiency, open and flexible.
- **01.AI (Yi Model)**: Integrated the 01.AI models, with series of APIs featuring fast inference speed, which not only shortened the processing time, but also maintained excellent model performance.
### 2. Local Large Language Model (LLM) Support
To meet the specific needs of users, LobeChat also supports the use of local models based on Ollama, allowing users to flexibly use their own or third-party models.
### 3. Model Visual Recognition
LobeChat now supports OpenAI's latest model with visual recognition capabilities, a multimodal intelligence that can perceive visuals. Users can easily upload or drag and drop images into the dialogue box,
and the agent will be able to recognize the content of the images and engage in intelligent conversation based on this,
creating smarter and more diversified chat scenarios.
This feature opens up new interactive methods, allowing communication to transcend text and include a wealth of visual elements.
Whether it's sharing images in daily use or interpreting images within specific industries, the agent provides an outstanding conversational experience.
### 4. TTS & STT Voice Conversation
LobeChat supports Text-to-Speech (TTS) and Speech-to-Text (STT) technologies, enabling our application to convert text messages into clear voice outputs, allowing users to interact with our conversational agent as if they were talking to a real person. Users can choose from a variety of voices to pair with the agent.
Moreover, TTS offers an excellent solution for those who prefer auditory learning or desire to receive information while busy. In LobeChat, we have meticulously selected a range of high-quality voice options (OpenAI Audio, Microsoft Edge Speech) to meet the needs of users from different regions and cultural backgrounds.
Users can choose the voice that suits their personal preferences or specific scenarios, resulting in a personalized communication experience.
### 5. Text to Image Generation
With support for the latest text-to-image generation technology, LobeChat now allows users to invoke image creation tools directly within conversations with the agent. By leveraging the capabilities of AI tools such as DALL-E 3, MidJourney, and Pollinations, the agents are now equipped to transform your ideas into images.
This enables a more private and immersive creative process, allowing for the seamless integration of visual storytelling into your personal dialogue with the agent.
### 6. Plugin System (Function Calling)
The plugin ecosystem of LobeChat is an important extension of its core functionality, greatly enhancing the practicality and flexibility of the LobeChat assistant.
By utilizing plugins, LobeChat assistants can obtain and process real-time information, such as searching for web information and providing users with instant and relevant news.
In addition, these plugins are not limited to news aggregation, but can also extend to other practical functions, such as quickly searching documents, generating images, obtaining data from various platforms like Bilibili, Steam, and interacting with various third-party services.
### 7. Agent Market (GPTs)
In LobeChat Agent Marketplace, creators can discover a vibrant and innovative community that brings together a multitude of well-designed agents, which not only play an important role in work scenarios but also offer great convenience in learning processes.
Our marketplace is not just a showcase platform but also a collaborative space. Here, everyone can contribute their wisdom and share the agents they have developed.
### 8. Mobile Device Adaptation
We have carried out a series of optimization designs for mobile devices to enhance the user's mobile experience. Currently, we are iterating on the mobile user experience to achieve smoother and more intuitive interactions. If you have any suggestions or ideas, we welcome you to provide feedback through GitHub Issues or Pull Requests.
### What's more
Beside these features, LobeChat also have much better basic technique underground:
- [x] **Quick Deployment**: Using the Vercel platform or docker image, you can deploy with just one click and complete the process within 1 minute without any complex configuration.
- [x]  **Custom Domain**: If users have their own domain, they can bind it to the platform for quick access to the dialogue agent from anywhere.
- [x]  **Privacy Protection**: All data is stored locally in the user's browser, ensuring user privacy.
- [x]  **Exquisite UI Design**: With a carefully designed interface, it offers an elegant appearance and smooth interaction. It supports light and dark themes and is mobile-friendly. PWA support provides a more native-like experience.
- [x] **Smooth Conversation Experience**: Fluid responses ensure a smooth conversation experience. It fully supports Markdown rendering, including code highlighting, LaTex formulas, Mermaid flowcharts, and more.
More features will be added when LobeChat evolves

fields.Business Description: A pioneering startup headquartered in Finland, with a diverse team spanning over 5 countries. At Olioil, we’re on the cusp of revolutionizing the fight against oceanic oil spills through an innovative robotic solution, currently undergoing the patent process. Our approach integrates cutting-edge AI and satellite technology, culminating in a multinational collaboration of experts and universities.
fields.Long Business Description:
Oil spills pose a significant threat to marine environments, with devastating consequences for wildlife and ecosystems.
OliOil’s On-Deck Oil Spill Management Solution is giving immediate help with a robotic first aid kit oil boom system with semiautomated trawlers to ensure the oil will not spread across the sea when the accident happens.
Olioil’s innovative system is housed in a specialized on-deck container and can be deployed on oil tankers, large cargo vessels, and at commercial ports, enabling rapid response capabilities.
On the ship will be assembled high-performance autonomous robotic trawlers, equipped with AI-driven navigation and powerful engines. These boats can swiftly respond to oil spills, deploying inflatable oil booms stored on board. These booms are critical for containing and isolating spills, preventing the spread of oil until specialized oil recovery vessels—equipped with skimmers and other recovery tools—arrive to remove the oil from the water surface. The technology is under patent process and will be deployed to a POC process with Wärtsilä Zero Emission program that is partly funded by Business Finland. In the first phase the company is searching capital to run the POC program and later on to launch the product with selected shipping companies and harbors across the Globe.
fields.Tags: Cleaning oil spill, Bluetech, clean ocean, maritime

It's common to request feedback from your team but it's a pain to chase for it. Often feedback isn't provided on time or at all and this can lead to patchy information, reduced information and an unhappy team. 
aaask solves this problem by aaasking your team questions on autopilot. Set up the questions you want to ask and the people you want to ask them to and aaask will send out a reminder on your defined schedule.

fields.Long Business Description:

Zertia Academy: We provide specialized training programs that help businesses understand and comply with the latest AI regulations. 
Auditing Services: Our team conducts comprehensive audits to evaluate AI systems for transparency, bias, and operational integrity. 
Certification Services: We assist organizations in obtaining certification for their AI management systems, ensuring adherence to international standards, including the newly developed ISO/IEC 42001. 
What distinguishes us from others is our focus on certification. Zertia is one of the few organizations to offer ISO 42001 Certification, a groundbreaking standard that helps companies establish and maintain a robust AI management system. Furthermore, we are in the process of obtaining international accreditation to become a Conformity Assessment Body (CAB) for AI Management Systems (AIMS) through the ANSI National Accreditation Board (ANAB). This will position us to offer globally recognized certifications, enhancing our authority and credibility in AI governance.
fields.Tags: AI Compliance, Ethical Innovation, Regulatory Audits, ISO Certification

Git Digest is an innovative AI-powered platform designed to revolutionize communication within software development teams. In today’s fast-paced tech environment, staying informed about code changes is crucial for team leaders and stakeholders. Git Digest addresses this need by providing clear, concise summaries of code changes, allowing users to understand project progress without needing to dive into the technical complexities of code commits.
The platform is specifically tailored for team leaders, founders, and non-technical stakeholders who want to keep their finger on the pulse of development activities. Instead of relying on traditional daily stand-up meetings, Git Digest automates the communication process by delivering AI-generated updates directly to users’ inboxes. This feature not only saves time but also eliminates the need for lengthy meetings, enabling teams to focus on what truly matters: driving their projects forward.
Git Digest’s AI technology analyzes code changes and distills the information into digestible summaries. This approach fosters improved collaboration and ensures that everyone, regardless of their technical expertise, is aligned with the team's progress. By simplifying communication, Git Digest empowers teams to make informed decisions and enhance their overall productivity.
In addition to streamlining communication, Git Digest supports better project management. By keeping team leaders informed about development milestones and changes, the platform enables proactive adjustments and more strategic decision-making. Whether you are managing a small startup or overseeing a large-scale project, Git Digest provides the tools necessary to maintain clarity and alignment across your team.
Ultimately, Git Digest is not just a tool; it’s a transformative solution for modern software development. By bridging the gap between technical details and managerial oversight, Git Digest ensures that everyone stays informed and engaged, paving the way for successful project outcomes.

Nebbl is a cloud storage platform that allows you to connect storage buckets from any S3 compatible provider, offering full control, zero-knowledge encryption, and flexible, pay-as-you-go pricing. It’s secure, limitless, and gives you complete ownership of your files.
fields.Long Business Description:
Nebbl is a private cloud storage platform that empowers users with full ownership and control of their files by allowing them to connect directly to storage buckets from any provider. Think of it as your own private Dropbox, but with greater flexibility, enhanced privacy, and at a more affordable price.
Nebbl operates as a cloud storage management platform, enabling you to connect and manage storage buckets from multiple cloud providers simultaneously, all in one interface. The key distinction is that Nebbl doesn't sell storage space like traditional services. Instead, you link directly to your preferred cloud storage providers and use Nebbl to interact with the storage buckets you create yourself.
This model offers several major benefits:
Why Nebbl is Different?
1. Pay Only for What You Use:
With Nebbl, you’re only charged for the exact amount of storage you use, calculated daily. This means no more overpaying for storage space you don’t need. You have full control over your costs, ensuring you only pay for what you actually use.
2. Direct Cloud Storage Access:
Nebbl cuts out third-party intermediaries, connecting you directly to your chosen cloud storage provider (e.g., Backblaze, AWS, Google Cloud). This gives you full control over your files, allowing you to store, manage, and access them directly from your provider, ensuring that your data remains truly yours.
3. Zero-Knowledge Privacy with Client-Side Encryption:
Nebbl places a strong emphasis on privacy. It uses zero-knowledge encryption, meaning that only you can access your files. Even Nebbl has no visibility into your data. Through client-side encryption, your files are encrypted on your device before they’re uploaded to the cloud. This ensures that neither Nebbl nor your cloud provider can access or decrypt your files — only you hold the encryption key, guaranteeing complete privacy.
4. No File Size, Speed, or Quota Limits:
Nebbl imposes no restrictions on file sizes, transfer speeds, or storage quotas. Whether you need to store massive files or transfer large datasets, Nebbl gives you the freedom to store, upload, and download without any artificial limits.
5. Private and Secure Storage:
By connecting directly to your chosen cloud provider, your files remain fully under your control. Nebbl strengthens this with advanced encryption techniques to safeguard your data, ensuring that your privacy is maintained at every step.
6. Easy File Sharing:
Sharing files is effortless with Nebbl’s simple, customizable short links. With just one click, you can securely share large files with others, making collaboration quick and hassle-free.
7. Lifetime Access:
Nebbl offers a one-time payment option for lifetime access, eliminating the need for ongoing monthly fees. This gives you long-term storage freedom while minimizing recurring costs.
8. Affordable Pricing:
Nebbl's pay-as-you-go model ensures that you only pay for the storage you actually use. For example, storing 1 TB on Backblaze B2 costs as little as $0.20/day. This flexible pricing model makes Nebbl an affordable and cost-effective solution for both individuals and businesses.
Take Control of Your Cloud Storage
Nebbl gives you the flexibility, security, and cost-effectiveness that traditional cloud storage services can’t match. With direct cloud provider access, client-side encryption, and a pay-as-you-go pricing model, Nebbl ensures that your data is always in your hands — private, secure, and under your control.

Wave AI Note Taker: Your AI-Enhanced Recorder for Meetings, Calls & Notes
Wave brings AI technology to audio recording, transcription, and note-taking. Whether you’re in a meeting, lecture, or on a call, Wave records in the background, transcribes in real-time, and generates intelligent summaries. With secure cloud storage and seamless sharing, Wave makes organizing your conversations easier than ever.
fields.Long Business Description:
Wave AI Note Taker: Your Smartest Audio and Phone Call Recorder for Transcription, Note-Taking & More
Wave is not just another audio recorder—it's your AI-powered assistant for effortless dictation, transcription, and note-taking.
Whether you're in a business meeting, a classroom lecture, or on a call, Wave ensures you never miss a crucial detail.
With its seamless background audio recording, intelligent summaries, and powerful AI transcription features, Wave simplifies meetings for maximum productivity.
Put AI into action today to capture, organize, and share your conversations.
Key Features of Wave AI Note Taker:
AI-Powered Audio Recording & Transcription
- Non-stop audio recording: Wave works in the background, continuously capturing conversations without interrupting your workflow. Ideal for in-person meetings, lectures, and personal notes.
- Real-time transcription: Instantly convert your recorded audio or phone calls into accurate, shareable text. Perfect for meetings, interviews, and dictation. Say goodbye to manually taking notes.
- Phone call recording: Seamlessly record phone calls through the app and automatically generate detailed transcriptions and summaries, keeping your conversations organized and easy to reference.
Intelligent Summaries for Quick Review
- AI-generated summaries: Wave's cutting-edge AI technology distills lengthy conversations into concise summaries, giving you the key takeaways at a glance. Focus on what matters most without combing through hours of audio.
- Voice to text made simple: Wave converts your spoken words into actionable lists, notes, and to-dos, turning your conversations into organized tasks or key ideas.
Privacy & Security Focus
- Secure and private: With Wave, your recordings and transcriptions are fully secure. You control your data—easily export or delete any files when needed. No recordings are stored without your permission, ensuring your privacy.
- Cloud storage and backup: Safely store your transcriptions and audio in the cloud for easy access anytime, anywhere.
Unlimited Recording Time
- No time limits: Wave allows you to record as much as you want, whether it’s a short dictation or a long in-person meeting. You’ll never have to worry about running out of time mid-conversation.
Easy Organization and Sharing
- Organized notes: Wave’s intuitive interface lets you categorize and organize your recordings into easily searchable lists or memos, making it a perfect tool for students, professionals, and everyday use.
- Multiple share options: Share your transcribed audio or text via URL, PDF, iMessage, and more. Keep your team, clients, or family in the loop with just a few taps.
- Siri support: Set up Siri shortcuts or use the Action Button to instantly start recording a new meeting or note on the go.
Flexible Use Cases
- In-person meetings: Perfect for professionals who need accurate meeting minutes or summaries of discussions. Wave is built for seamless recording of face-to-face conversations, making it easier to stay present and engaged.
- Students and educators: Record and transcribe lectures, classroom discussions, and personal study sessions with ease. Organize your notes for easy review before exams or group projects.
- Journalists and interviewers: Capture interviews with crystal-clear audio and convert them to text for easier editing and article writing.
- For everyone: Whether you’re using it as a notepad, memo recorder, or to capture important moments from your phone calls, Wave is versatile and easy to use for every type of user.
Why Users Love Wave
Here’s what some of our users have to say:
- “Honestly don’t know how this app can do such a good job with taking notes of technical stuff and acronyms and things, but it does.”
- “Wave took down the people names, and somehow they were able to tell who is who when they spoke and they would put down the person name and 98 times out of 100 they were correct.”
- “Wave did capture all notes from the last two very complex design sessions and it very neatly clearly succinctly gave me a summary with next steps in the way it organized the notes was fantastic.”
Designed for Maximum Productivity
Wave helps you get more done in less time:
- Boost productivity by focusing on the conversation, not on taking notes.
- Stay organized with searchable transcriptions and notes—easily find any word or topic without scrubbing through audio files.
- Export and share important meeting notes, memos, or interviews instantly to streamline your workflow.

fields.Business Description:
Dog Supplies Store
We are your online store specializing in premium dog products. We offer a wide range of items, including stylish walking outfits, durable toys, comfortable clothing and cozy beds, all designed to enhance the life of your pet. Our commitment to quality ensures that each product is made from the finest materials, combining functionality and style. Explore our collection and give your furry friend the best in Feliz Ladrando
fields.Long Business Description:
At Feliz Ladrando, our passion lies in delivering high-quality, stylish, and functional accessories that cater to the unique needs of dogs and their owners. With our latest campaign, we aim to highlight our curated collection of premium products designed to enhance the well-being and style of dogs, while ensuring their comfort and safety during everyday activities.
Campaign Focus:
Our campaign is centered around a wide selection of dog accessories that strike the perfect balance between design and functionality. Whether you have a playful puppy or a calm older dog, our collection has been crafted with great care to meet the diverse needs of various breeds and personalities. We understand that every dog is unique, and our products reflect that with adjustable sizes, durable materials, and stylish designs.
Featured Products:
1. Premium Harnesses:
Our harnesses are the cornerstone of our collection. They are designed to provide both style and practicality, with soft, breathable fabrics that prevent irritation and chafing during walks. The harnesses are fully adjustable, ensuring a comfortable fit for dogs of all shapes and sizes. Whether you're taking your dog for a short stroll or a long hike, our harnesses offer the support and control you need while allowing your dog the freedom to explore. Available in various colors and patterns, our harnesses add a stylish touch to your dog's daily wardrobe.
2. Matching Collars and Leashes:
In addition to harnesses, our collection includes a wide variety of collars and leashes made from high-quality, durable materials. These accessories are designed to withstand daily wear and tear while providing a secure and comfortable fit for your dog. Our matching sets allow you to coordinate your dog’s collar, leash, and harness, offering a polished look that stands out on walks. Whether you prefer simple elegance or bold patterns, our range of designs ensures there's something for every pet owner.
3. Walking Sets for Convenience and Style:
For those who appreciate convenience without compromising on style, our walking sets are the perfect solution. These sets include a matching harness, collar, and leash, making it easy to prepare for a walk while maintaining a coordinated, fashionable look. Our walking sets are designed with both dogs and owners in mind, combining comfort with durability. The materials used are lightweight yet strong, ensuring that your dog remains comfortable while you maintain control.
4. Raincoats and Dog Apparel:
No dog should have to miss out on a fun walk because of bad weather. Our raincoats provide protection from the elements, keeping your dog dry and comfortable in rainy conditions. Our collection of dog apparel includes not only raincoats but also cozy sweaters and jackets that help keep your dog warm on chilly days. These garments are easy to put on and take off, making them practical for everyday use while keeping your dog looking adorable.
5. Cozy Dog Beds and More:
At the end of the day, your dog deserves a cozy place to rest. Our transformable dog beds are designed to provide the ultimate comfort and support, allowing your dog to relax after a day of play. The beds are made from soft, high-quality fabrics that are easy to clean and maintain. Our range includes beds for dogs of all sizes, ensuring that every pet can enjoy a peaceful sleep.
Special Offer:
To make our products even more accessible, we are offering free shipping on orders over 40€ as part of our campaign. For smaller orders, a flat shipping fee of 3.99€ applies. This offer allows customers to save on shipping costs while purchasing high-quality products for their furry companions.
Why Choose Feliz Ladrando?
At Feliz Ladrando, we believe that your dog deserves the best. That’s why we put so much care and attention into creating products that not only look great but are also durable, comfortable, and safe. Our commitment to quality, style, and customer satisfaction makes us the go-to choice for dog owners who want the very best for their pets.
Join us today and explore our latest collection, designed to keep your dog happy, healthy, and stylish!

Users can input large documents and receive summaries tailored to their needs, whether they want a brief overview or a detailed analysis. 
One of the key features of Long Summary is its scalability; as users increase the summary length, they capture more nuances and critical details from the original text, ensuring that important information is retained. This makes it a valuable resource for various users, including businesses that need to distill lengthy reports into actionable insights, and professionals who want to quickly understand extensive research papers or legal documents without missing key points.
Additionally, Long Summary allows for flexible input and output, enabling users to summarize entire books, academic theses, or collections of documents. It supports file uploads in various formats, simplifying the process of information extraction. For developers, Long Summary offers a robust API, allowing easy integration of its summarization technology into applications, websites, or services, enhancing the overall functionality of their products.

fields.Business Description: DmarcDkim.com is a comprehensive DMARC (Domain-based Message Authentication, Reporting, and Conformance) solution designed to enhance email infrastructure analytics and security. Our platform offers a user-friendly approach to implementing and managing DMARC, which is crucial for improving email delivery rates and combating email impersonation scams.
fields.Long Business Description:
DmarcDkim.com helps elevate your email campaigns by increasing the likelihood of bypassing spam filters and improving overall email deliverability. This ensures your messages reach their intended recipients effectively. Our system also safeguards your domain reputation against spoofing attacks and implements a compliant email authentication setup to maintain brand integrity.
Users gain access to intuitive dashboards that provide comprehensive insights into email delivery performance. These tools make it easy to identify and address misconfigured email sources, optimizing your email infrastructure. We provide actionable insights through easy-to-handle action plans to fix email delivery issues, along with guided assistance through the process of becoming DMARC compliant.
Our platform is designed for universal accessibility, catering to a wide range of users including CEOs, marketers, product managers, and developers. No expert knowledge is required to start securing your email domain, making it an ideal solution for businesses of all sizes and technical expertise levels.
How It Works
The process begins with a domain check, where we perform an instant analysis of your domain to identify potential threats and weak spots in your email security and deliverability. Next, you'll connect your domain to DmarcDkim.com to start receiving and analyzing DMARC reports. This monitoring setup allows you to gain valuable insights into your email authentication performance.
Once connected, you'll have access to our comprehensive dashboard. This gives you a clear overview of your email sources and helps identify areas for improvement in your email delivery strategy. Throughout the process, we provide step-by-step guidance to achieve full DMARC compliance and maximize your email security.
Why Choose DmarcDkim.com?
DmarcDkim.com stands out for its simplicity. We handle the complex challenges of email security and deliverability, allowing you to focus on your core business activities. Our solution has proven effectiveness, with users reporting increases in email delivery rates of up to 25%.
We offer comprehensive protection against various email-based threats, including Business Email Compromise (BEC) attacks, which have cost businesses billions of dollars. Our platform is specifically designed to backtrace DMARC verification failures and provide actionable solutions, leveraging our expertise in email authentication.
With DmarcDkim.com, you receive continuous support through ongoing monitoring and analysis to ensure your email infrastructure remains secure and efficient. By choosing our service, you're not just implementing a security measure; you're investing in the trust and reliability of every message you send.
Join us in our mission to accelerate worldwide DMARC adoption and create a safer digital communication environment for businesses and individuals alike. With DmarcDkim.com, you can trust that your email communications are protected, compliant, and optimized for delivery.
fields.Tags: DMARC Analytics, DMARC Check, B2B, SaaS

fields.Business Description: An open-source library for browser plugin and Flutter app developers to monetize their products through consensual bandwidth sharing.
fields.Long Business Description:
Mellowtel is an innovative open-source library designed to help developers monetize their browser extensions and Flutter applications ethically. It allows users to opt-in to share a portion of their unused internet bandwidth, which is then utilized by AI labs and startups to access public websites for training their models. This process is entirely consensual, with users having full control to opt-out at any time. Mellowtel emphasizes transparency, user privacy, and minimal impact on user experience. Developers can integrate Mellowtel into their browser plugins or Flutter apps to start earning revenue based on factors like the number of active users and their geographical location. Key features include:
- Open-source and transparent code
- User-controlled participation
- Privacy-focused design with no collection of personal data
- Support for both browser extensions and Flutter applications
- Sustainable monetization for developers without compromising user trust
The library aims to create a sustainable ecosystem for digital products, offering an alternative revenue stream for developers while maintaining respect for user privacy and experience.
fields.Tags: Developer Tools, Browser Extensions, Mobile App Development

listings.name: Klink – Super App for Home Buyers

fields.Business Description: Klink is the go-to app for future and existing home owners. From starting to think about saving up for a deposit to those who are ready to apply for a mortgage, Klink helps you save smarter and earn rewards so you can get onto the property ladder.
fields.Long Business Description:
Klink is an innovative mobile application designed to assist aspiring homeowners in achieving their property ownership goals. The app serves as a comprehensive platform that combines financial planning, savings strategies, and educational resources to help users navigate the complex journey of buying a home.
Key Features and Functionality:
Goal Setting and Planning
Klink allows users to set specific home-buying goals by inputting their income, savings potential, and desired location for future property purchases. The app then analyses this information to provide a realistic timeline for achieving homeownership, highlighting potential obstacles along the way.
Financial Insights and Spending Analysis
By leveraging Open Banking technology, Klink offers detailed insights into users' spending habits. The app reviews outgoings and identifies areas where users can potentially save more money. This feature helps users understand their financial behaviours and how they may impact their ability to purchase a home in the future.
Personalised Savings Missions
Klink provides users with tailored "missions" or challenges designed to boost their savings. These missions often involve reducing spending in specific categories, such as clothing, entertainment, or dining out. By completing these missions, users can accelerate their savings and potentially shorten the time needed to reach their home-buying goals.
Rewards System
The app incorporates a gamified rewards system where users can earn "Klink coins" for various activities within the app. These coins can be converted into cash rewards, which contribute directly to the user's home deposit savings. Activities that earn rewards include taking quizzes, referring friends, and utilising the app's features regularly.
Educational Resources
Klink offers a wealth of educational content focused on home buying and financial wellbeing. These resources aim to improve users' financial literacy and prepare them for the complexities of the mortgage application process.
Mortgage Readiness Score
The app provides users with a "readiness score" that indicates their likelihood of mortgage approval. This feature helps users understand where they stand in terms of mortgage eligibility and what factors might be affecting their chances.
Competitions and Incentives
Klink organises daily and weekly competitions where users can win cash prizes. The more actively users engage with the app and earn rewards, the higher their chances of winning these competitions.
User Experience and Interface
Klink boasts an intuitive and user-friendly interface that makes navigating the app's features straightforward. The app utilises the full screen of mobile devices to provide an immersive experience, particularly when displaying content and insights.
Availability and Compatibility
Klink is available for download on both the Apple App Store and Google Play Store. It supports iOS devices running iOS 13 and higher, as well as Android devices running Android 6.0 and above. While the app primarily serves users in England, Wales, and Scotland, it can be downloaded internationally.

fields.Business Description: AI Humanize is a tool that turns AI text into human-like writing, helping users avoid AI detection. It works in three steps: paste AI-generated text, check AI content with 'AI Detect', and 'Humanize' to create undetectable content. It offers a free trial and various pricing plans for content creation and privacy.
fields.Long Business Description:
AI Humanize is an innovative tool that transforms AI-generated text into content that is close to human writing style, allowing users to evade detection and tracking by AI systems. This tool provides an AI-driven solution for content creation, while enhancing users' writing capabilities and protecting their privacy.
Users can use AI Humanize in three simple steps. Copy and paste AI-generated text from ChatGPT, Bard, or any other AI content generator into the input box. Select the "Detect AI" button to evaluate the AI content in the text. The tool's AI detection model is trained based on seven different AI detectors to ensure that its content is safe to pass AI detection. After clicking the "Humanize" button, AI Humanize will generate text content that is highly similar to human creations, which will not be recognized by AI detectors. After the generation is completed, the new text will automatically be AI-detected.

fields.Business Description: Scopilot.ai is an innovative AI-powered platform designed to revolutionize the software project scoping process. Our tool automates the creation of comprehensive project scopes, including feature lists, user stories, and documentation, by transforming simple project descriptions into detailed, actionable plans. Scopilot.ai significantly reduces the time and effort traditionally required for project planning, allowing development teams, agencies, freelancers, and product managers to focus more on execution and less on manual scoping tasks.
fields.Long Business Description:
Scopilot.ai is a cutting-edge platform that redefines the way software projects are scoped and planned. At its core, Scopilot.ai harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to automate the traditionally complex and time-consuming process of project scoping. By transforming basic project descriptions into comprehensive, detailed, and actionable plans, Scopilot.ai enables teams to streamline their workflows, reduce manual errors, and significantly accelerate the development process.
Our Platform:
Scopilot.ai is designed to cater to the needs of software development teams, agencies, freelancers, and product managers who require precise and efficient project scoping. The platform automatically generates complete feature lists, user stories, and documentation based on the input provided, ensuring that every aspect of a project is thoroughly planned and documented from the outset. This automation not only saves time but also enhances the accuracy of project scopes, leading to better alignment between project goals and execution.
Advanced AI Capabilities:
The heart of Scopilot.ai lies in its advanced AI and machine learning algorithms, which are continuously trained to understand project requirements and generate the most relevant outputs. By employing natural language processing (NLP), Scopilot.ai can interpret project descriptions in plain language and convert them into structured, actionable plans. This capability allows users to quickly move from concept to execution, with minimal manual intervention required.
Integration and Flexibility:
One of the key strengths of Scopilot.ai is its seamless integration with existing project management and development tools. Whether your team uses Jira, Trello, or any other popular platform, Scopilot.ai fits right into your existing workflow, enhancing efficiency without requiring significant changes to your processes. Additionally, Scopilot.ai is customizable, allowing users to tailor the generated scopes and documentation to meet specific project needs and preferences.
Scalability and Versatility:
Scopilot.ai is built to scale with your projects, making it suitable for organizations of all sizes, from small startups to large enterprises. Whether you’re working on a single project or managing multiple complex initiatives, Scopilot.ai provides the tools needed to ensure every project is well-planned and executed with precision. The platform’s versatility also makes it an ideal choice for a wide range of industries, including software development, product management, and technology consulting.
Mission and Vision:
At Scopilot.ai, our mission is to empower development teams and organizations to deliver successful projects faster and more efficiently. We believe that by automating the scoping process, we can help our users focus on what they do best—building great products and delivering value to their customers. Our vision is to become the leading tool for project scoping and planning, helping businesses around the world turn their ideas into reality with greater speed, accuracy, and confidence.
Customer Success:
Since its inception, Scopilot.ai has been adopted by a diverse range of customers, including large software development agencies, tech startups, enterprise-level companies, and freelance professionals. Our platform has proven to be a game-changer in project management, enabling these customers to achieve more accurate planning, reduced time to market, and improved project outcomes. As we continue to evolve, Scopilot.ai remains committed to meeting the changing needs of our users and delivering the highest level of service and innovation.
The Future of Project Scoping:
As the software development landscape continues to evolve, Scopilot.ai is at the forefront of innovation, continually refining our platform to meet the demands of the industry. With ongoing advancements in AI and machine learning, Scopilot.ai is poised to set new standards for project scoping, helping teams navigate the complexities of modern software development with greater ease and efficiency.
In summary, Scopilot.ai is more than just a tool—it's a comprehensive solution designed to simplify project scoping, enhance planning accuracy, and empower teams to deliver successful projects on time and within budget. Whether you're a startup looking to bring a new product to market or an established enterprise managing large-scale development efforts, Scopilot.ai is your partner in success.

fields.Business Description: Mellow is an HR platform offering tools and solutions that transform the way companies engage with contingent workers. It enables the seamless integration of contractors into companies' workflows, streamlining their talent management and selection processes. Additionally, Mellow provides various mechanisms to support freelancers with a wide array of issues, including payment solutions. With offices in New York, Limassol, and London, Mellow's services are available globally.
fields.Long Business Description:
Mellow is a global HR platform transforming how companies engage with contractors, moving from one-time task hires to incorporating them as integral members of the workforce. The company streamlines this process through a set of technological solutions and by assuming all risks and obligations associated with engaging contractors, such as misclassification or legal issues. At the same time, it benefits contractors by ensuring they are paid and receive benefits, bridging the gap between full-time and project-based work.
Mellow was founded in 2024 by Pavel Shynkarenko, an entrepreneur with over 20 years of experience in financial and legal technologies and client-contractor relationship automation. In 2014, he noticed a growing demand for payment and administrative assistance for businesses working with independent contractors, and this prompted him to launch his first HR tech company, Solar Staff. Initially, the firm provided solutions for service deal optimization. This gradually led to the creation of a multi-tool platform that capitalizes on Solar Staff's decade-long work in this field and responds to the growing demand for specialized solutions for long-term interaction with contractors. Thus, Solar Staff, as a global company, pivoted to Mellow, transferring to it an extensive base of clients in the USA and Europe. Mellow’s mission is to help companies prepare for the future of work, where contract relationships become a common alternative to full-time employment. The company’s CEO is Pavel Shynkarenko, who has stepped down from leading Solar Staff to fully concentrate on this new venture. Benefiting from Solar Staff's client base, Mellow is already working with more than 1,500 companies and 400,000 contractors from over 100 countries. It has a monthly turnover of €18M and an MRR of €800K.
Despite playing in a crowded field, Mellow stands out from its competitors. For instance, firms like Deel, Remote, and Oyster limit themselves to offering either Employer-of-Record (EOR) services for company staff members or tools like payroll management, but do not assume any legal risks. Other services, like Deel Shield, Worksome, and Talent Desk, focus exclusively on expensive Contractor-of-Record (COR) services. On the other hand, Mellow comes with a set of various contractor-related solutions within one contract, and a pay-as-you-go model that makes the non-employee engagement process convenient, transparent, and legally viable. This is the case even when companies are working with contractors from hard-to-reach regions.
The portfolio of Mellow’s solutions is centered on regional demand. The US-based tools, which feature Contractor-of-Record service and an AI-powered tool for finding the right talent by leveraging the hiring manager’s network, are focused on B2B audiences. The European solutions respond to the local demand for enhancing freelancers’ social security, including payment-related assistance, legal services for obtaining digital nomad visas, and tax support.
Mellow is headquartered in Limassol (Cyprus) and has offices in New York and London. The company has a team of 60 people and works with brands such as SumSub, Joom, G2G, Paltalk, Clickadu and Stocksy.

fields.Long Business Description:

Foodentyco, an award-winning startup recognized by Invitalia, champions the artisanal organic movement as an antidote to industrialized organic farming. Rejecting monoculture and unfair pricing, Foodentyco sources products from small Southern Italian farms, emphasizing crop rotation, biodiversity, and sustainable practices. Its innovative approach includes three dedicated websites for local, national, and international markets, paired with an express delivery service ensuring fresh, high-quality products within 24 hours in Italy and 48 hours across Europe.
fields.Long Business Description:
Foodentyco, recognized by Invitalia as one of the most promising startups, is at the forefront of the artisanal organic movement, countering the trend of industrialized organic farming. This movement rejects the principles of monoculture, large-scale farming, and unsupportive pricing, instead embracing the true essence of organic agriculture. By focusing on crop rotation, biodiversity, and mixed farming practices, Foodentyco brings back the authentic spirit of organic farming.
Born in the heart of Southern Italy, a region known for its untouched agricultural excellence, Foodentyco connects small-scale artisanal producers with consumers. The startup emphasizes a short supply chain, often involving just one intermediary between the producer and the end consumer, and sources products locally to support sustainability and fairness in the food industry.
Foodentyco's innovative model includes an online platform split into three segments: a local site serving nearby customers, a national site for Italian consumers, and an international site for European customers. After selecting their desired products and choosing a delivery date, customers benefit from Foodentyco's express delivery service, which ensures fresh and high-quality products are delivered within 24 hours in Italy and within 48 hours across the rest of Europe. This model allows consumers to enjoy the genuine flavors of Southern Italy in a manner that is both convenient and environmentally responsible.

fields.Business Description: Darkleets is an innovative cybersecurity platform designed to connect and empower cybersecurity enthusiasts, professionals, and hackers. Our platform offers a comprehensive suite of features including the latest insights on vulnerabilities, malware, and threat actors, as well as community-driven write-ups, and a rich library of educational videos. Additionally, we provide managed cybersecurity services for startups and unique learning opportunities through our "Exploit School." Darkleets aims to democratize access to cybersecurity knowledge and resources, fostering a collaborative environment to tackle digital threats effectively. Visit us at https://darkleets.com to learn more.
fields.Long Business Description:
Darkleets is a pioneering cybersecurity platform designed to serve and empower a diverse community of cybersecurity enthusiasts, professionals, and ethical hackers. Our mission is to create a comprehensive, collaborative environment where users can stay informed, share knowledge, and enhance their skills in the ever-evolving field of cybersecurity.
Key Features of Darkleets:
Insights: Our Insights feature provides users with up-to-date feeds on trending vulnerabilities, malware, threat actors, events, write-ups, and videos. This serves as a centralized hub for the latest research, expert analyses, and significant cybersecurity developments, keeping users ahead of emerging threats.
Write-Ups: The Write-Ups feature allows users to share their research, experiences, and insights, fostering a community-driven approach to learning and problem-solving. With advanced filtering options based on type, category, and tech stack, users can easily find relevant content. The platform also encourages engagement through likes and comments, promoting meaningful discussions and collaborations.
Videos: Our Videos feature includes a rich library of content organized into Discover, Security, Exploit, Conferences, and Originals categories. Users can engage with the videos by commenting and liking, and each video is tagged with relevant keywords to enhance searchability. While many videos are freely accessible, premium content will be available exclusively to subscribed users after the MVP is successfully built.
Managed Cybersecurity Services for Startups: Darkleets offers tailored cybersecurity solutions for startups, helping them protect their digital assets and stay secure as they grow. These managed services are designed to address the unique challenges faced by new businesses in the digital landscape.
Exploit School: Our Exploit School is a unique learning platform offering specialized cybersecurity courses and bootcamp programs. With exclusive content that cannot be found elsewhere, Exploit School aims to equip users with the skills they need to excel in cybersecurity.
Upcoming Features:
Hackfeed: A real-time feed of hacking news, trends, and alerts, keeping users informed about the latest in the cybersecurity world.
Jobs: A dedicated job board connecting cybersecurity professionals with employers, featuring opportunities across various roles and levels.
Bug Bounty: A platform where companies can post their bug bounty programs, allowing ethical hackers to find and report vulnerabilities in exchange for rewards.
User Profiles for Companies and Educational Institutions: Profiles for organizations and institutions to showcase their cybersecurity programs, collaborate on research, and engage with the Darkleets community.
Community and Collaboration:
Darkleets excels in facilitating collaboration and networking through features like discussion forums, private messaging, and group projects. Our platform is open to anyone passionate about cybersecurity, from seasoned professionals to curious beginners, democratizing access to valuable knowledge and resources.
Our Vision:
At Darkleets, we are committed to advancing cybersecurity by building a robust community of experts and learners who can collectively tackle digital threats. Our platform is designed to provide users with the tools and information they need to stay ahead in the rapidly changing cybersecurity landscape.
Get Involved:
Darkleets is currently in development, with our MVP 70% completed. We invite you to join our community and be among the first to access our exclusive features. Visit us at https://darkleets.com to learn more and stay updated on our progress.
By combining cutting-edge features, a collaborative community, and specialized services, Darkleets aims to be the premier platform for cybersecurity professionals and enthusiasts worldwide. Join us in making cyberspace safer for everyone.
fields.Tags: Advanced Threat Intelligence, Cybersecurity Collaboration, Managed Cybersecurity Services, Ethical Hacking Community

fields.Business Description: Luna is an innovative beauty platform that connects clients with professional hairdressers and makeup artists around the world. With an easy-to-use interface, Luna allows users to browse artist profiles, view portfolios, and book appointments seamlessly. Our commission-free model empowers beauty professionals to keep 100% of their earnings while providing clients with a reliable and convenient way to access high-quality beauty services. Luna is transforming the beauty industry by making it simpler and more efficient for everyone to find and book the perfect beauty professional.
fields.Long Business Description:
Luna is a revolutionary beauty platform designed to transform the way clients search for hairdressers and makeup artists globally. Our mission is to bridge the gap between beauty professionals and clients by offering a seamless, user-friendly experience that caters to the diverse needs of the beauty industry.
Features and Benefits:
Comprehensive Artist Profiles: Luna provides detailed profiles for each beauty professional, showcasing their skills, portfolios, certifications, and client reviews. This transparency allows clients to make informed decisions based on the artist’s expertise and previous work.
Global Reach: Luna connects clients with beauty professionals from all over the world, enabling users to find and book services whether they are at home or traveling. This global accessibility ensures that clients can always access high-quality beauty services, no matter their location.
Commission-Free Model: Unlike many other platforms, Luna operates on a commission-free model. This means that beauty professionals keep 100% of their earnings from bookings made through Luna. This model not only empowers artists financially but also attracts high-quality professionals to the platform.
Tiered Membership Options for artists: Luna offers a range of membership tiers, each designed to unlock additional features and benefits. From basic profiles to premium listings with enhanced visibility, Luna’s tiered memberships cater to the varying needs and budgets of beauty professionals.
Community and Networking: Luna fosters a vibrant community of beauty enthusiasts and professionals. Artists can connect, collaborate, and share ideas, while clients can engage with the community through reviews, recommendations, and social media integration.
Advanced Search and Filters: Luna’s advanced search and filtering options allow clients to find the perfect beauty professional based on specific criteria such as location, service type, price range, and availability. This ensures that clients can quickly and easily find the services that best meet their needs.
Regular Updates and Innovation: Luna is committed to continuous improvement and innovation. We regularly update the app with new features and enhancements based on user feedback, ensuring that Luna remains at the forefront of the beauty industry.
Why Luna Stands Out:
User-Centric Design: Luna is designed with both beauty professionals and clients in mind. The user-friendly interface and comprehensive features ensure a satisfying experience for all users.
Empowerment and Fairness: By operating on a commission-free model, Luna empowers beauty professionals to maximize their earnings, fostering a fair and supportive environment for artists.
Global Accessibility: Luna’s ability to connect clients with beauty professionals worldwide sets it apart from other platforms, making it a go-to solution for both local and international beauty needs.
Commitment to Quality: With detailed artist profiles, client reviews, and a focus on transparency, Luna ensures that clients receive high-quality beauty services from trusted professionals.
In summary, Luna is redefining the beauty industry by providing a comprehensive, user-friendly platform that connects clients with top-tier beauty professionals globally. With its innovative features, commission-free model, and commitment to quality, Luna is poised to become the leading platform for beauty services. And most important of all is founded by a hairdresser and a makeup artist for hairdressers and make up artists.

Familiar Tools, No Learning Curve

Streamlined Workflow, Exceptional Results

Features That Elevate Your Menu Experience
Seamless Google Sheets Integration: Leverage the power of a familiar tool to manage your menu data with ease.

Oruga specialises in producing proprietary track mobility systems. Our first application is the Oruga UNITRACK, the world's first all-terrain electric single track vehicle designed to be versatile, rugged, and robust with the environment in mind, and it is created for use in a variety of terrains, seasons, and operations. It provides professionals and outdoor enthusiasts with an unstoppable and powerful off-road experience.
fields.Long Business Description:
Oruga UNITRACK™: Any-terrain, All Seasons
The Problem:
Outdoor businesses and enthusiasts face a constant struggle. Different terrains demand different vehicles - snowmobiles for winter, ATVs for mud, dirt bikes for trails, and specialized rigs for rock crawling. Owning all of these is expensive, space-consuming, and requires constant gear swaps.
Our Solution:
The Oruga UNITRACK™ is a revolutionary all-terrain vehicle (UTV) designed to conquer harsh and difficult environments you throw at it - snow, mud, sand, or rocks. It eliminates the need for multiple seasonal vehicles, saving you money, time, and storage space.
How It Works:
The Oruga UNITRACK™ combines the traction of a track system with the steering and tilting of a motorcycle.  This innovative Oruga UNITRACK™ technology delivers unparalleled versatility, allowing you to explore with confidence regardless of the terrain.
The Impact:
Reduced Emissions & Noise: Owning one vehicle instead of multiple translates to a smaller environmental footprint. The Oruga UNITRACK™ has the potential to revolutionize the off-road industry, minimizing operational burdens and promoting a more sustainable future for outdoor exploration.
Our Target Market:
EU & North American Businesses: Perfect for outdoor operations, businesses requiring reliable all-terrain access will find the Oruga UNITRACK™ an invaluable asset.
Outdoor Professionals: Guides, rangers, and anyone who works in the outdoors can benefit from the Oruga UNITRACK™s unmatched versatility.
Weekend Explorers (Gen X): Adventure seekers who crave off-the-beaten-path experiences will find the Oruga UNITRACK™ the ultimate exploration companion.
A New Off-Road Category is Born:
The Oruga UNITRACK™ is not just a vehicle; it's a new way to experience the outdoors. Unlimit your adventures and conquer any terrain with confidence.
Contact us today to learn more about the OrugaUNITRACK™ and join the off-road revolution!

DroneX 360 is an innovative "Drone as a Service" (DaaS) start-up dedicated to transforming the facility management and renewable energy sectors through advanced drone technology. Building Cleaning: Our drones perform thorough cleaning of high-rise buildings, eliminating the risks associated with traditional cleaning methods.
Solar Panel Cleaning: We enhance the efficiency of solar farms by ensuring panels are clean and operating at maximum capacity.
Windmill Cleaning and Deicing: Our drones maintain wind turbines, ensuring they are free from dirt and ice, thereby improving their performance and longevity.
Solar and Windmill Inspections: We provide detailed inspections, identifying potential issues early to reduce downtime and maintenance costs.
DroneX 360 operates with a strong focus on sustainability, utilizing eco-friendly chemicals and promoting the use of renewable energy. We are committed to enhancing the safety of maintenance operations, reducing environmental impact, and delivering cost-effective solutions to our clients.
Our team is composed of experts with extensive backgrounds in mechanical engineering, renewable energy, data engineering, and business management. We are dedicated to continuous innovation and customer satisfaction, positioning DroneX 360 as a leader in the drone service industry.
Join us in our mission to revolutionize facility management and contribute to a sustainable future.
